loans.name: Bon Berger Group

texts.fr: Jeanine est commerçante, membre de la banque villageoise «Bon Berger», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 33 ans, mère de 5 enfants dont 4 étudient et 1 est encore gosse. Elle est vendeuse des poissons dans la rue  de la ville depuis 10 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en 400 poissons. Elle débuta par le premier fonds reçu d’un crédit. Elle souhaite acheter une parcelle, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables. Nous tenons à signaler que certaines clientes portent leurs bébés.
texts.en: Jeanine is a trader and member of the "Bon Berger" Banc Villageois. A customer of IMF Hekima, she is 31 years old, married and mother to five children, four of whom are at school while one is still very young. She has been selling fish in the town's road for the past ten years. She is going to buy 400 fish. She began her business with a loan. She would like to be able to buy a plot of land, as well as to educate and feed her children. Finally she would like to thank Hekima for the support it provides to entrepreneurs who do not have access to banks. It should be noted that some of the customers in the photo are carrying their babies.

loans.use: to stock up with 400 fish.

loans.name: Joyeuse Group

texts.fr: Kwiraviwe est une entrepreneuse qui commerce des ustensiles de cuisine dans un magasin de la ville, membre du groupe de crédits «Joyeuse», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, âgée de 45 ans, mariée, mère de 10 enfants scolarisés. Elle va s’approvisionner en assiettes, casseroles, cuillères et fourchettes. Il y a 20 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité, avec le premier capital reçu de son mari. Elle souhaite accroitre son activité, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Kwiraviwe is an entrepreneur who sells kitchen utensils in a shop in town. She is [also] a member of the loan group "Joyeuse" and a member of the micro-finance institution Hekima.

She is 45 years old, married, and the mother of ten children. All of the children are in school.

[With this loan], Kwiraviwe is going to procure plates, casserole dishes, spoons, and forks. She has 20 years of experience with this business, which she started with funds she received from her husband.

Kwiraviwe wishes to increase her business and feed and educate her children.

Finally, she thanks Hekima for their support to entrepreneurs who lack access to financial services.

loans.use: to procure plates, casserole dishes, spoons, and forks.

loans.name: Fleurette

texts.fr: Fleurette a 49 ans, elle est mariée et elle a six enfants. Elle habite dans la ville de Petit-Goâve avec son mari et ses enfants et elle revend des produits alimentaires à domicile. Cela fait plus de dix ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en:
Fleurette is 49 years old, married, and has six children. She lives in Petit-Goâve with her husband and children.

Fleurette sells food products from her home. She has done this for more than 10 years.

She is seeking this micro-loan to increase her stock.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Bernite

texts.fr: Bernite a 33 ans, elle vit en union libre et elle a trois enfants qui sont scolarisés. Elle gère une petite boulangerie depuis bientôt huit ans et cette activité marche assez bien. Elle demande un microcrédit pour acheter des ingrédients afin de faire du pain.
texts.en:
Bernite is 33 years old. She lives with her partner and her three children, who are in school.

Bernite has run a small bakery for almost eight years. This business does quite well.

She is seeking this micro-loan to buy ingredients to make bread.

loans.use: to buy sacs of flour.

loans.name: Judith

texts.fr: Judith a 31 ans. Elle est divorcée et elle a un enfant à charge. Afin de subvenir aux besoins de son enfant, elle vend des produits alimentaires sur un petit étal, à l’entrée de sa maison. Elle cherche un microcrédit pour acheter des sacs de riz. À l’avenir, elle espère augmenter ses revenus afin de pouvoir économiser davantage.
texts.en: Judith is 31 years old and divorced. She has one child in her care. In order to be able to provide for her child's needs, she sells groceries on a small stall at the entrance to her house. She is requesting a microloan so that she can buy sacks of rice. In the future she would like to be able to increase her income to save more.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice.

loans.name: Chrisienne

texts.fr: Chrisienne a deux enfants et est séparée de son mari. Elle gère un commerce où elle vend des vêtements neufs et des bijoux fantaisie depuis 14 ans. Dans le but d'assurer la viabilité de son commerce, elle demande un microcrédit afin d'augmenter son stock. A l'avenir, elle espère économiser suffisamment pour que ses enfants puissent aller à l'université.
texts.en: Chrisienne has two children and is separated from her husband. She has for the past 14 years been managing a small business selling new clothes and costume jewelry. She is requesting a microloan to increase her stock, with a view to ensuring the viability of her business. In the future she would like to be able to save enough for her children to go to university.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Marienne

texts.fr: Marienne a 43 ans et elle est divorcée. Elle a démarré son activité en vendant des produits cosmétiques. Elle travaille dans le commerce de produits cosmétiques depuis plus dix ans. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de lotions.
texts.en: Marienne is 43 years old and divorced. She began her business selling cosmetics and she has been working in this business for more than ten years. She is requesting a microloan to increase her stock of lotions.

loans.use: to increase her stock of beauty lotions.

loans.name: Nace Una Estrella Group

texts.en:
Quetzaltenango, also known by its indigenous name, Xela, is the second-largest city in Guatemala, and it is here that “Nace una Estrella”, or “A Star is Born” trust bank has its home. Nace una Estrella is made up of 10 fighter-women who are united by a similar goal: to search for solutions to get out of poverty.

Lilian, who is 45 years of age, is the elected group president. She has 2 children who are currently studying in primary school, and she was fortunate enough to complete her studies in secondary school. Lilian runs a variety of businesses, making and selling chocolate, selling shoes, and selling catalog products. She is requesting a loan which will help her buy the ingredients she needs for her chocolate-making: cacao, sugar, and cinnamon, and a small part of the loan will also go towards her shoe shop, restocking to get ready for end-of-year sales and the festive season.

These 10 ladies are thankful for the loan, which gives them hope to expand their businesses and see increased profits, which will help improve their families' lives and lead them toward an exit to the poverty they currently experience. Thank you Kiva for making this possible!

loans.use: to buy the ingredients she needs for her chocolate-making: cacao, sugar, and cinnamon.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.en:
Gabriel is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Gabriel has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.
Before joining Babban Gona, Gabriel would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs, such as for food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support Gabriel can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.
As a Babban Gona member, Gabriel will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. Gabriel is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to build a house for his family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Hermilise

texts.fr: Hermilise a 51 ans, elle vit en union libre et elle n’a pas d’enfant. Elle revend de la lessives et des produits alimentaires depuis 10 ans. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock et à l'avenir elle espère ainsi gagner des revenus plus élevés.
texts.en: Hermilise is 51 years old and lives in a common-law marriage; she does not have any children. She has been selling washing powders and groceries for the past ten years. She is requesting a microloan to increase her stock, and by doing so she hopes in the future to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy crates of washing powder.

loans.name: Martha

texts.fr: Martha a 34 ans et elle vit en union libre. Elle vend des produits alimentaires à domicile et elle gère cette activité depuis 15 ans. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock afin d’attirer plus de clients.
texts.en: Martha is 34 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. She sells groceries from home and has been doing this for the past 15 years. She is requesting a microloan to increase her stock so she can attract more customers.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Arman

texts.en:
Arman runs a bakery in Hayravanq village of Gegharquniq region. He lives with his parents, and his mother is a teacher at the local village school.
In the bakery, Arman produces Armenian lavash bread, which he delivers to a store. The requested loan is vital for Arman's bakery, as he needs to purchase a dough mixer and flour for the bread production.
Arman hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for a dough mixer and flour for the production of Armenian lavash bread.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is 63 years old. She is married with 2 children.

She has had a dairy farming business for 15 years. She will be using the loan to buy more animal feed for her cows.

She will use her anticipated profit to educate her children and also to repay her loan.

Her hopes and dreams for the future are to improve her house and to live a successful life.

loans.use: to buy more animal feed for her cows.

loans.name: Saminu

texts.en:
Saminu is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Saminu has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.
Before joining Babban Gona, Saminu would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs for food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support Saminu can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.
As a Babban Gona member, Saminu will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. Saminu is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to ensure that all his children get a post-secondary education.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating the pressure to sell maize for a low price at harvest.

loans.name: Yolande

texts.fr: Yolande a 36 ans, elle est divorcée et elle a deux enfants. Pour faire vivre sa famille, elle revend des vêtements. Avec les maigres revenus qu’elle y gagne, elle paie la scolarité de ses enfants et nourrit la famille. Mais elle est déterminée à améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille. Elle demande un microcrédit pour développer son activité et augmenter son stock de vêtements.
texts.en: Yolande is 36 years old and divorced; she has two children. She retails clothes in order for her family to survive, and with the little income she makes, she pays for her children's schooling and feeds her family. However, she is determined to improve her family's living conditions and is requesting a microloan to develop her business and increase her stock of clothes.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Gislaine

texts.fr: Gislaine a 52 ans et est veuve. Elle a quatre enfants et elle gère un petit commerce d’épices. C’est ainsi qu’elle gagne sa vie et nourrit sa famille. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock d’épices.
texts.en: Gislaine is 52 and a widow. She has four children and she runs a small business selling spices. That is how she earns a living and feeds her family. She requests a micro credit to increase her stock of spices.

loans.use: to increase her stock of merchandise.

loans.name: Mona

texts.fr: Mona a 53 ans, elle est mariée et elle a trois enfants. Son activité consiste à vendre du café en grain et en poudre. Cela fait cinq ans qu’elle gère cette activité. Elle demande un microcrédit pour éviter les ruptures de stock.
texts.en: Mona is 53, she is married with three children. Her activity consists of selling coffee grains and ground coffee. She has been running this business for five years. She requests a micro credit to avoid stock shortages.

loans.use: to buy sacks of coffee grains.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
Sandra, de 27 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar cuando era pequeña, porque su familia era de escasos recursos económicos, pero eso no le quito el deseo de superarse y ahora a pesar de su edad está estudiando en el turno de la noche para aprender a leer y a escribir.- Sandra, está acompañada, tiene 3 hijos que están estudiando y su pareja trabaja fuera de casa. 

Sandra, tiene una tienda desde hace tres años, ella inicio este negocio para poder ayudarle a su pareja con los gastos de la casa.

Sandra, necesita el préstamo para invertir en su tienda, específicamente para comprar arroz, frijoles, pan, detergentes, azúcar, entre otros productos; porque se acerca la época en la que existe más demanda de este tipo de productos. 

Sandra, sueña con tener una tienda más grande, para tener más variedad de productos y ayudar a sus hijos para que estudien en la universidad y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Sandra, 27, never had the opportunity to go to school when she was small because her family was poor. But this hasn't discouraged her from her desire to excel, and now, in spite of her age, she is studying at night to learn how to read and write. She is in a relationship and has three children who are studying in school. Her partner works outside of the home.

Sandra has owned a store for three years. She started this business to help her partner with the household expenses.

Sandra needs this loan to invest in her store, specifically to buy rice, beans, bread, sugar, detergent, among other products. The season is approaching when there is more demand for these types of products.

Sandra dreams of having a larger store so that she can offer a greater variety of products and of helping her children to be able to go to college and be professionals.

loans.use: to invest in her story, specifically to buy rice, beans, bread, sugar, detergents, among other products.

loans.name: Dieumène

texts.fr: Dieumène est âgée de 31 ans. Elle vit en union libre et mère de trois enfants. Elle revend des produits alimentaires dans une petite boutique à la maison. Elle a besoin d’un prêt pour augmenter son stock. Son rêve est de devenir une grande commerçante et de gagner beaucoup de bénéfices sur son activité.
texts.en: Dieumène is 31. She lives in a de facto union and has three children. She sells food products in a little stall at home. She needs a loan to increase her stock. Her dream is to become an important tradeswoman and to make a good profit from her business.

loans.use: to increase her stock of food products.

loans.name: Pierre

texts.fr: Pierre est marié. Il a 58 ans. Il vend de la vaisselle depuis 20 ans. Dans le but d'attirer plus de clients, il souhaite augmenter son stock. Ainsi, il demande un prêt pour acheter davantage de produits. A l'avenir, il espère continuer à gérer son commerce et avoir de bonnes conditions de vie.
texts.en: Pierre is married. He is 58. He has been selling dishes for 20 years. Hoping to bring in more customers, he would like to increase his stock. This is why he requests a loan to buy more merchandise. In the future, he hopes to continue to run his business and to have good living conditions.

loans.use: to increase his stock of dishes.

loans.name: Iliya

texts.en:
Iliya is a maize farmer and a Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, he has the opportunity to attain yields of up to eight metric tonnes of maize per hectare, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.
Before joining Babban Gona, Iliya would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. But thanks to Babban Gona’s support, he can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.
As a Babban Gona member, Iliya will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare. He is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, thus eliminating the pressure to sell his maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Venante

texts.fr: Venante a 44 ans. Elle vend des produits alimentaires et des boissons gazeuses dans une petite boutique. Elle tient ce commerce depuis plus de 25 ans. Elle demande un microcrédit pour s’approvisionner régulièrement afin d’éviter les ruptures de stock. A l’avenir, elle espère continuer à gérer son commerce.
texts.en: Venante is 44. She sells food products and carbonated drinks in a small shop. She has been running her business for over 25 years. She requests a micro credit so that she can buy supplies regularly in order to avoid stock shortages. In the future, she hopes to continue to run her business.

loans.use: to increase her stock of rice and fizzy drinks.

loans.name: Alhaji Abdu

texts.en:
Alhaji Abdu is a maize farmer and a Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, he has the opportunity to attain yields of up to eight metric tonnes of maize per hectare of Land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.
Before joining Babban Gona, Alhaji Abdu would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. But thanks to Babban Gona’s support he can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.
As a Babban Gona member, Alhaji Abdu will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. He is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, thus eliminating pressure to sell his maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Hrahat

texts.en:
In Ddmashen village in the Gegharkunik region of Armenia lives Hrahat, his wife and two sons. Hrahat has always worked in farming and agriculture. On his farm, he has a cow, calves, bulls, and a lot of pigs and chickens. He also cultivates potatoes and tomatoes on his plot of land and through the sale of all his farm products he earns a living. He sells some milk and meat (beef and pork), as well as a lot of eggs and vegetables at the city’s wholesale market to his regular customers.
Now, Hrahat is asking for this loan of 700,000 Armenian drams as he must buy a lot of fodder for his cattle to last them through the winter period.

loans.use: to buy enough fodder for his cattle to last the winter period.

loans.name: Yau

texts.en:
Yau is a maize farmer and a Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Yau has the opportunity to attain yields of up to eight metric tonnes of maize per hectare, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.
Before joining Babban Gona, Yau would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. But thanks to Babban Gona’s support, he can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.
As a Babban Gona member, Yau will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. He is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, thus eliminating pressure to sell his maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Auriestela

texts.es: Auriestela hace poco tiempo inicio con su propia tienda general, en la cual ofrece diversos productos a sus clientes. Solicita un préstamo de $2,100 para la compra de una refrigeradora y demás equipo necesario para la colocación de productos, así como la compra de estructura metálica para su instalación en ventanas, esto con el fin de mejorar la seguridad en el establecimiento.
texts.en: A short time ago Auriestela started her own general store, in which she offers her clients various products. She is requesting a loan of $2,100 to buy a refrigerator and more equipment necessary for the arrangement of her products, as well as for the purchase of metal framework to be installed on windows with the aim of improving the security of the establishment.

loans.use: to buy equipment and supplies for  her general store

loans.name: Varditer

texts.en: Varditer lives in Sevan city in the Gegharkunik region of Armenia. She has a higher education in teaching and has been working as a physics teacher since 1992. She says that her subject is one of the most interesting and difficult ones, but the relationship between humans and physics in every day life is so close, that it is just very important for everyone to know the explanation behind the forces that affect them. As well as her main job, Varditer also teaches paid private courses in physics and helps pupils with their entrance exams. She lives with her husband (a musician) and two daughters (the elder is an accountant and the younger is a student). Varditer is asking for this loan of 700,000 Armenian drams as she wants to buy a computer, computer accessories and professional literature for her teaching activities.

loans.use: to buy a computer, accessories and professional literature for her teaching activities.

loans.name: Josue Nahum

texts.es:
El señor Josué de 30  años de edad es soltero y vive en su casa propia junto a sus padres,  se dedica desde hace 02  años al oficio de transportista en Moto taxis, cuenta con 1 unidad de transporte que actualmente la está pagando, sus clientes son todas las personas que se trasladan a los distintos lugares del  municipio.
Don Josué vive en una aldea al sur de Honduras, es un hombre emprendedor con deseos de mejorar su calidad de vida.
Don Josué está solicitando el préstamo para compra de repuestos  y  accesorios  para mejorar su unidad de transporte y así tenerla en perfectas condiciones de trabajo, con este préstamo el pretende mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo  con deseos de  trabajar  con Prisma.
Su sueño es  terminar de pagar su Mototaxi lo más pronto posible.

San Lorenzo, Honduras  - Octubre del  2015
texts.en:
Josué, 30 years old, is single and lives in his own house with his parents. He has worked for 2 years in the trade of driver of motorcycle taxis. He has 1 vehicle that he is currently paying off. His customers are all the people that he brings to the different places in the municipality.

Josué lives in a town in the south of Honduras. He is an enterprising man with desire to improve his quality of life.

Josué is asking for the loan to purchase parts and accessories to improve his vehicle and, so, to have it in perfect working condition. With this loan, he plans to improve his income and his quality of life. He is a new borrower with desire to work with Prisma.

His dream is to finish paying for his motorcycle taxi as soon as possible.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October 2015

loans.use: to purchase parts and accessories for his business.

loans.name: Martha Luz

texts.es:
Martha, de 39 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos que están estudiando, ella no estudio y no sabe leer ni escribir y su esposo es agricultor.

Martha, se ha dedicado siempre al cuidado de sus hijos y a los oficios domésticos, pero desde hace ocho años hace tamales y otros productos para salir a vender en las tardes en su comunidad.

Martha, necesita el préstamo para comprar maíz, pollo y hojas de huerta para mejorar su negocio, porque se acerca la temporada navideña y quiere aprovechar la época para generar más ingresos.

Martha, sueña con seguir con su negocio y ayudar a su esposo para cubrir las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Martha, 39 years old, is married and has three children who are studying. She didn't study and can't read or write. Her husband is a farmer. She has always been devoted to the care of her children and to housework, but for eight years now she has been making tamales and other products to sell out in the afternoons in her community.

Martha needs the loan to buy corn, chicken, and vegetable leaves to improve her business because the holiday season is approaching and she wants to take advantage of the time to generate more revenue. She dreams of continuing with her business and helping her husband to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, chicken, and vegetable leaves to improve her tamales business.

loans.name: Hursant

texts.ru:
Хурсант позитивная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. С детства Хурсант мечтала стать учительницей, но так сложились обстоятельства, что она не смогла получить высшего образования из-за финансовой недостаточности в семье. Сразу после окончания средней школы Хурсант выдали замуж. И так она стала домохозяйкой. Но, даже находясь постоянно  дома,  Хурсант никогда не сидела без дела. Несмотря на совй возраст она вместе с мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым.
Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Хурсант вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Хурсант выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Хурсант получает хороший доход. Муж Хурсант работает в сельской школе, его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Хурсант с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Хурсант заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Hursant is a hardworking woman with a positive outlook.  She is married and has two children, and lives in a small, rural town.  Hursant's childhood dream was to become a teacher, but her family's financial circumstances were such that she couldn't get a higher education.  Hursant was married off as soon as she finished school, and so she became a homemaker.  But even though she was always at home, she never sat around with nothing to do.  Now, in spite of her age, she and her husband do everything they can to provide their children with everything that they need.

In order to have a steady income, Hursant and her husband started their own cattle business.  Hursant raises cattle and sells their meat and milk.  Hursant earns a good income from the business.  Hursant's husband works in the village school and his job brings an additional income for the family.  Their combined income is enough to live on an average level, but they don't have the resources to cover all their needs.

Currently Hursant and her husband want to buy several more head of cattle for fattening up and later sale.  For this purpose, Hursant applied to MDO Arvand, LLC for a loan to buy cattle.  Hursant is grateful in advance for Arvand's support, which will help improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Jesús Humberto

texts.es:
El joven  Jesús  de 28  años de edad es soltero y vive en su casa propia junto a sus familia,  se dedica desde hace 02  años a su oficio como transportista, cuenta con 1 unidad de transporte que actualmente la está pagando, sus clientes son todas las personas que se trasladan al a distintos lugares de la comunidad y necesitan este transporte por ser el único en la zona y también por ser el más económico.
Jesús trabaja de lunes a domingo y le va muy bien, es un hombre emprendedor con deseos de mejorar su calidad de vida.
Esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de repuestos como llantas y  accesorios para mejorar su unidad de transporte y así tenerla en perfectas condiciones de trabajo, con este préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo  con deseos de  trabajar  con Prisma.
Su sueño es  terminar de pagar su Mototaxi lo más pronto posible.

San Lorenzo, Honduras  - Octubre del  2015.
texts.en:
The young man, Jesús, 28 years old, is single and lives in his own house with his family. He has worked for 2 years in the trade of driver. He has 1 vehicle which he is currently paying off. His customers are all the people who he carries to the different parts of the community and who need this transportation because it is the only one in the zone and also because it is more economical.

Jesús works from Monday to Sunday and it is going very well for him. He is an enterprising man with desire to improve his quality of life.

He is asking for the loan to purchase parts such as tires and accessories to improve his vehicle and, so, to have it in perfect working condition. With this loan, he plans to improve his income and his quality of life. He is a new borrower with desire to work with Prisma.

His dream is to finish paying for his motorcycle taxi as soon as possible.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October 2015.

loans.use: to purchase tires and accessories for his business.

loans.name: Eleno

texts.es:
Eleno, de 64 años de edad, está acompañado y vive con su pareja y sus dos hijos que están estudiando y se dedica a la ganadería y a la crianza de ganado.

Eleno, tiene 20 años de experiencia en la agricultura y la ganadería, todo lo que sabe lo aprendió de su padre, quien siempre se dedicó a trabajar con ganado; ahora trabaja la agricultura y la ganadería junto a su pareja.

Eleno, necesita el préstamo para colocar una pequeña tienda de granos básicos y de productos de primera necesidad, que será administrada por su pareja y también para comprar una vaca lechera; de esta manera tendrá un nuevo ingreso económico para su hogar y podrá cumplir con su compromiso creditico. 

Eleno, sueña con apoyar a sus hijos en su educación y adquirir uno nuevo préstamo para instalar una granja de gallinas ponedoras y crear un estanque para cultivar peces.
texts.en:
Eleno, 64 years old, is partnered and lives with his partner and their two children who are going to school, and he works raising animals and raising livestock.

Eleno has 20 years of experience in agriculture and raising animals. Everything that he knows, he learned from his father who always worked with livestock. Now he works in agriculture and raising animals with his partner.

Eleno needs the loan to establish a small store of basic grains and basic pantry items which will be run by his partner and also to purchase a dairy cow. In this way, he will have new income for his household and will be able to meed his credit commitment.

Eleno dreams of supporting his children in their education and getting another loan to install a hen house for laying gens and to make a pond to raise fish.

loans.use: to establish a small store of basic grains and basic pantry items and to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Jose Britaldo

texts.es:
José Britaldo con 50 años de edad,vive en casa propia de material rústico,junto a su cónyuge y su menor hija, en el distrito de La Peca,provincia de Bagua,departamento de Amazonas,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura,especificamente al cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 1,5 hectárea de variedad Catimor resistente a enfermedades, plantación esta en su 4 años de producción tiene 5 años de edad, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace 08 años. Adicionalmente se dedica al cultivo y venta de cacao. El destino del crédito será para invertir en el mantenimiento y cultivo de 1,5 hectáreas de café en fase de de floración, asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2016, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

José Britaldo es socio nuevo para Edpyme. Firma con su cónyuge.
texts.en:
José Britaldo is 50 years old and lives in his own home made from rustic material along with his partner and young daughter in the district of La Peca, in the province of Bagua in the department of Amazonas in Peru. He has good personal and professional references from the inhabitants of the area. The inhabitants of the area mainly earn a living in farming, business and livestock breeding.

He earns a living in farming, specifically in growing coffee. He currently has 1.5 hectares of the Catimor variety which is resistant to diseases. His farm is in its fourth year of production and is five years old. He has eight years of experience in this area. He also works growing and selling cocoa. The loan will be used to maintain and farm his 1.5 hectares of coffee which is in the flowering stage. This will ensure good production for the 2016 campaign which will be reflected in a higher number of sales and therefore he will earn a better income and thus be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

José Britaldo is a new member of Edpyme. He is signing with his partner.

loans.use: to invest in maintainng and farming his 1.5 hectare coffee farm which is at the flowering stage.

loans.name: Nigina

texts.ru:
Нигина трудолюбивая и жизнерадостная женщина. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем и имеет 4 детей. У неё среднее специоальное образование. Она работает медсестрой в сельской больнице. 
Для того, чтобы иметь дополнительный доход на пропитание Нигина  вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Нигина  выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Нигина  получает хороший доход. Муж Нигины работает председателем дехканского хозяйства. Его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Нигина  с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Нигина  заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Nigina is a hardworking and cheerful woman.  She is 39 years old, married, and has four children.  She has a specialized secondary education and works as a nurse in the village hospital. In order to have an additional income, Nigina and her husband started their own cattle business.  Nigina raises the cattle and sells their meat and milk.  She earns a good income from the business.  Her husband is the chairman of a farming organization.  His job brings an additional income for the family.  Their combined income is enough for them to live at an average level, but they don't have the financial means to cover all their needs.

Currently, Nigina and her husband want to buy several more head of cattle for fattening and later sale.  For this reason, Nigina applied to MDO Arvand, LLC for a loan to buy cattle.  Nigina is grateful in advance to Arvand for its help, which will improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Arcadio

texts.es:
Arcadio, de 58 años de edad, es viudo y tiene tres hijos pero todos ya tienen sus propias familias.

Arcadio, es mecánico desde hace muchos años, este oficio lo aprendió cuando trabajaba en un taller de mecánica; pero además de eso también tiene una tienda de productos básicos y se dedica a la agricultura.

Arcadio, necesita el préstamo para comprar abono y contratar mozos para que trabajen en los cultivos de maíz.
texts.en:
Arcadio, 58 years old, is a widower and has three children but they all have their own families now.

Arcadio has been a mechanic for many years, he learned this trade when he worked in a mechanic shop. But, in addition to this, he also has a store of basic products and works in agriculture.

Arcadio needs the loan to purchase manure and hire workers to work with the corn crop.

loans.use: to purchase manure and hire workers to work with the corn crop.

loans.name: Lilian Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lilian, de 31 años de edad, es sastre de profesión, pero también se dedica a realizar los oficios domésticos de su casa, es madres soltera, tiene 2 hijos y en su casa también vive su mamá.

Lilian, tiene 2 años de experiencia de trabajar en corte y confección de prendas de vestir, pero también vende perfumes y cosméticos por catálogo, de esta manera genera ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de su familia. 

Lilian, necesita el préstamo para comprar materiales de sastrería, porque tiene muchos pedidos y necesita abastecer su dispensario de insumos para poder cumplir sus compromisos.
	
Los sueños de Lilian, son tener un bazar y un negocio amplio de productos de cosmetología, para generar más ingresos y apoyar a sus hijos en su educación.
texts.en:
Lilian, 31 years old, is a tailor by profession, but also she works taking care of the household tasks. She is a single mother, she has 2 children and her mother also lives in her house.

Lilian has 2 years of experience working in designing and sewing clothing but she also sells perfumes and cosmetics from a catalog and in this way she generates income to cover her family's needs.

Lilian needs the loan to purchase tailoring materials because she has many orders and needs to stock up her supply dispensary to be able to meet her commitments.

Lilian's dreams are to have a general store and a broader business of cosmetology products to generate more income and support her children in their education.

loans.use: to purchase tailoring materials, because she has many orders and needs to stock up her supply dispensary to be able to satisfy her commitments.

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru: Гулмира, 28 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее - средне-специальное образование, она работает телефонистом в Войсковой части. Стаж работы свыше 5 лет. Ежемесячная заработная плата Гулмиры - около 15,000 сом (KGS). Накопленные средства она старается вкладывать в воспитание детей и благоустройство дома. Гулмира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двери, труб, батарей и прочих материалов для ремонта и утепления дома. Утепление дома позволит создать благоприятные условия для проживания ее детей в зимний период.
texts.en:
Gulmira is 28 years old, married and the mother of two children.  She has a specialized secondary education and works as a telephone operator on a military installation.  She has been on this job for five years and has a monthly salary of 15,000 som (KGS).  Gulmira is using her savings for her children's education and improving her home.

Gulmira has applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy a door, pipes, heaters and other materials for repairing and insulating her home.  The insulation will help her to create a comfortable environment for her children during the winter.

loans.use: to buy a door, pipes, heater, etc. for repairing and insulation of her house

loans.name: Sarahi

texts.es:
Sarahi, de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, es comerciante y está acompañada, tiene tres hijos y su pareja es albañil.

Sarahi, tiene un negocio de venta de comida desde hace varios años y uno de sus hijos le ayuda en el negocio.

Sarahi, necesita el préstamo para comprar, platos, vasos, cacerolas, verduras, sillas y mesas, porque en esta época las ventas incrementan.

Sarahi, sueña con ver a sus hijos felices y con una buena familia y seguir trabajando para apoyarlos y que no les falte nada.
texts.en:
Sarahi, 37 years old, went to school up to the second grade, is a businesswoman and is partnered. She has three children and her partner is a bricklayer.

Sarahi has had a business selling food for some years and one of her children helps her in the business.

Sarahi needs the loan to purchase plates, glasses, pans, vegetables, chairs and tables, because in this season, sales increase.

Sarahi dreams of seeing her children happy and with a good family and to continue working to support them so that they don't lack anything.

loans.use: to purchase plates, glasses, pans, vegetables, chairs, and tables, because in this season, sales increase.

loans.name: Wendy Beraly

texts.es:
Wendy, de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está soltera, tiene dos hijos pero aún no estudian y en su casa también vive su mamá, pero solo sus hijos dependen económicamente de ella.

Wendy, trabaja en un negocio de ropa desde hace 1 año, su mamá también tenía una venta de ropa y fue ahí donde ella aprendio todo lo relacionado a la venta de este producto, ahora su horario de trabajo es desde las 6:30 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m.                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Wendy, necesita el préstamo para comprar zapatos y sandalias para comenzar su propio negocio y de esa manera mejorar su situación económica.

Wendy, sueña con que su negocio de ropa sea exitoso y ayudar a sus hijos para que puedan estudiar.
texts.en:
Wendy is 25 years old. She studied up to 6th grade. She is single and has two children but neither of them are at school. Her mother also lives in her home but only her children depend on her financially.



Wendy has worked in a clothes business for one year. Her mother also has a clothes sales point and this is where she learned everything related to selling these products. Now she works from 6.30am to 4pm. Wendy needs the loan to buy shoes and sandals to start her own business and in this way improve her financial situation.



Wendy dreams of her clothes business being successful and helping her children so that they can go to school.

loans.use: to buy shoes and sandals to start her own business.

loans.name: Melanio

texts.es:
Melanio con 52 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente,vive en casa propia de material rústico,junto a su cónyuge y sus hijos, en el distrito de Santo Tomás,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura,especificamente al cultivo de café,de variedad Catimor, contando a la fecha con 1 hectárea ,en producción de 3 años de edad variedad catimor resistente a enfermedades, plantación esta en su segundo año de producción, este cultivo realiza en terreno propio en el Caserío Playa Grande del Distrito de Santo Tomas. También dedicado a la cría-engorde de ganado vacuno, cuenta con más de 20 años de experiencia en este rubro, tiene terreno de invernas propias para dicha actividad. Adicionalmente cría animales menores (gallinas, cuyes, chanchos y otros) y cultivo de productos de pan llevar (yuca, menestras, vitucas y otros productos de la zona. El destino del crédito será asumir gastos de mantenimiento de parcela agrícola de 1 hectárea de café de 3 años de edad, en fase de espigas florales, asegurando campaña 2016 con una mejor y mayor producción reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtener mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

Melanio es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. EL firmará con su cónyuge.
texts.en:
Melanio, 52 years old, is partnered, lives in his own house made of rustic material with his partner and their children, in Santo Tomás district, Cutervo province, Cajamarca department, in the country of Peru. He has very good personal and work references on the part of the people in the zone. The inhabitants of this area work primarily in agriculture, trade and raising animals.

He works in agriculture, specifically growing coffee of the Catimore variety. He has, to date, 1 hectare in production with 3-year-old Catimore variety, resistant to disease. This plantation is in its second year of production, he grows this on his own land in the village Playa Grande in Santo Tomás district. He also works raising and fattening cattle, he has more than 20 years of experience in this field, he has winter land for this activity. In addition, he raises small animals (hens, guinea pigs, pigs, and more) and grows basic products (yucca, legumes, vituca and other local products). This loan will be destined to cover the expenses of maintaining his agricultural plot of 1 hectare of 3-year-old coffee in the floral spike stage, assuring the 2016 season with better and increased production reflected in a larger sale volume and, in the end, by getting more income so as to be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

Melanio is a returning borrower for Edpyme Alternativa. He will co-sign with his partner.

loans.use: to cover the costs of maintaining his agricultural plot of 1 hectare of 3-year-old coffee.

loans.name: Las Malditas Infieles Group

texts.es:
Vivian es una mujer de 34 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 3 hijos de 1, 6 y 8 años, y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos. 
Ella es constante, fuerte y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla de forma ambulante en la zona ‘mutualista’ área central donde se encuentran la mayor parte de oficinas públicas y privadas.
Vivian es de tez trigueña, cabello largo castaño lo usa amarrado y estatura mediana (la primera de la derecha, viste polera a rayas horizontales), su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al transporte y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en un cuarto alquilado construido de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. En esta oportunidad lidera la banca de emprendimiento. Su negocio es la venta ambulante de cosméticos por catálogo, de las marcas; Ésika, L’Oreal, Revlon, y otros…, actividad que realiza toda la semana visitando ferias y comercios de la ciudad. Los productos con mayor demanda son; lápiz labial, pintura de ojos, rubor y otros, “Cualquier cosmetólogo te dirá que el maquillaje barato puede hacer mucho y no tienes que pagar una fortuna…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que las ventas las realiza a pedido y por catálogo eso le ayuda a manejar los montos de compra, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para comprar nuevos productos. Su sueño es ser la vendedora elegida del lugar, ella desea comprar cosméticos de temporada por mayor, para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Esta es la 3 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que desarrolla esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Vivian solicita un préstamo para comprar cosméticos para ofertar nuevas variedades por temporada de fiestas.
texts.en:
Vivian is a 34-year-old woman, lives with her partner and has 3 children, ages 1, 6, and 8, and her business is selling cosmetics.

She is tenacious, strong and very hard-working. Her business is done as a travelling saleswoman in the Mutualista zone, a central area where the majority of the public and private offices are found.

Vivian is olive-skinned, has long brown hair that she keeps tied back and is of medium stature (she is the first on the right, wearing a shirt with horizontal stripes). Her native language is Guaraní which she speaks with her family and she speaks Spanish due to the general culture and for the work she does. She shares her life with her partner who works in transportation and with her children who go to school. They live in a rented room built of brick which has drinking water, electricity and sewer services. At this time, she leads the business bank. Her business is the sales of cosmetics by catalog as a travelling saleswoman, of the brands Ésika, L’Oreal, Revlon, and others…, work that she does all week, visiting markets and businesses in the city. The products with the greatest demand are lipstick, eye shadow, blush and morel. "Any cosmetologist will tell you that cheap makeup can do a lot and you don't to have to pay a fortune..." she says. The advantage of her business is that she does her sales by order and through a catalog, this helps her to manage the amount of purchases. The disadvantage is the lack of money to buy new products. Her dream is to be the selected saleswoman in the place, she wants to purchase seasonal cosmetics in bulk to satisfy her customers' demand. This is the 3rd loan cycle with the institution in the 3 years that she has been doing this work.

For these reasons, Vivian asks for a loan to purchase cosmetics to offer new varieties for the holiday season.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics to offer new varieties for the holiday season.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos es un joven emprendedor, que tiene amplia experiencia en el manejo de tiendas de varios productos. Con un préstamo de $2,000 puede tramitar la inscripción de su nuevo negocio, así como la obtención de certificados de salud necesarios para el funcionamiento de dicho negocio. De esta forma podrá iniciar con su proyecto y generar los ingresos económicos para su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young entrepreneur, who has extensive experience in managing stores of various products.

With a loan of $2,000 he can process the registration of his new shop, as well as the procurement of health certificates, which are necessary for the operation of the mentioned shop.
In this way he will be able to start his project and to generate the economic income for his family.

loans.use: to pay for legal procedures to get his general store started.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es:
El joven José Mauricio de 23  años de edad es soltero y vive en su casa propia junto a su familia,  se dedica desde hace 02 años al oficio como transportista de personas en Mototaxi, cuenta con 1 unidad de transporte que actualmente la está pagando, sus clientes son todas las personas que se trasladan a distintos lugares de la comunidad.
José Mauricio trabaja de lunes a domingo y le va muy bien,  vive en una aldea al sur de Honduras,  es un hombre emprendedor con deseos de mejorar su calidad de vida.
José Mauricio está solicitando el préstamo para poder terminar de cancelar la moto taxi y también comprar unos accesorios para su moto taxi y quedar con un solo préstamo, con esta inversión pretende mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo  con deseos de  trabajar  con Prisma.
Su sueño es  terminar de pagar su Mototaxi lo más pronto posible y más luego comprarse otra mas nueva.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Octubre del  2015.
texts.en:
José Mauricio is 23 years old. He is single and lives in his own home with his family. For two years he has earned a living as a driver of a moto-taxi. He has one vehicle which he is currently paying for. His customers are all of the people who travel between different places in the community.
José Mauricio works from Monday to Sunday and it is going very well for him. He lives in a suburb in the south of Honduras. He is an entrepreneurial man with the desire to improve his quality of life. He is asking for a loan to be able to finish paying for his moto-taxi and also to buy some accessories for it and to have just one loan. With this investment, he hopes to improve his income and his quality of life. He is a new customer who wishes to work with Prisma.
His dream is to finish paying for his moto-taxi as soon as possible and eventually buy a new one.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October 2015.

loans.use: to buy accessories and finish paying for his vehicle for his business.

loans.name: Joseph Alexis

texts.es: Joseph tiene 21 años de edad. El es egresado de la carrera de mecánica automotriz. En la actualidad el se encuentra estudiando un curso de sistemas hidráulicos de equipo pesado. El crédito lo invertirá en la cancelación de sus curso. El tiene como fin al culminar sus estudios trabajar en una empresa prestigiosa que preste servicios de mecánica automotriz. Y más adelante poder tener su propia empresa. El agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado.
texts.en: Joseph is 21 years old. He is doing a degree in automotive mechanics. Currently he is studying a course about hydraulic systems of heavy equipment. The loan will be used to pay for his courses. His aim when he has finished his studies is to work in a prestigious company that offers services relating to automotive mechanics. Later on he wants to be able to have his own business. He is grateful to the Kiva investors for the loan given.

loans.use: to pay for his course in hydraulic systems.

loans.name: La Fortaleza Cusco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal "LA FORTALEZA CUSCO”, está ubicado en el distrito del Cusco, provincia del Cusco perteneciente a la región del Cusco.

La socia Marleny es una socia trabajadora, ella tiene 39 años, y se dedica a su negocio de venta de carne, menudencias y queso con esta actividad saca adelante a sus tres hijos.
La socia solicito el préstamo para comprar queso y carne. Para poder seguir ampliando sus negocio, y así brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.

Los otros socios del banco comunal se dedican a la venta de tamales, al negocio de desayunos, al negocio de peluquería y a brindar servicios a entidades públicas.
Los socios están contentos y agradecen a los inversionistas de KIVA por confiar en ellos y se comprometen  a cumplir sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
The borrowers belong to the La Fortaleza Cusco communal bank. It is located in the district of Cusco, Cusco province, which belongs to the Cusco region.

The borrower, Marleny, is a hard-working borrower. She is 39 years old and works at her business selling meat, giblets and cheese; with the work she gets her three children ahead.

The borrower asked for the loan to purchase cheese and meat to be able to continue expanding her business and, so, to offer her children a better quality of life.

The other borrowers in the communal bank work selling tamales, at a breakfast business, at a hairdresser business, and offering services to public entities.

The borrowers are happy and grateful to the Kiva investors for trusting in them and they promise to make their payments punctually.

loans.use: to purchase cheese and meat.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey is a responsible man who looks after his family; that is, the two children and his wife, all living in Fort Portal, Uganda. With the previous loan, he bought land and is growing there food crops like cassava and bananas for both commercial and subsistence farming, and has constructed there a nice residential house for his family which is not yet complete.

He is facing challenges like a poor road network and a lack of capital for his business. In the future, he has hopes of educating all his children to higher levels of learning.

Godfrey has asked for a loan to buy timber and cement to complete his house.

loans.use: to buy timber and cement to complete his house.

loans.name: Luchando Por El Futuro Group

texts.es:
Irma, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada, tiene 3 hijos y reside con su familia en una aldea del municipio de Gracias Lempira. Irma se ha dedicado a su propia fuente de ingresos que es el cultivo de maíz, frijol y café. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 16 años ofreciendo la producción en los mercados de la zona. Estos cultivos los realiza con ayuda de su esposo también. Con el fin de tener una actividad productiva ha decidido solicitar un préstamo en forma grupal para comprar abono, fungicidas y pago de mano de obra para el cultivo de maíz, frijoles y darle mantenimiento a su parcela de café. Ella piensa en seguir trabajando para darles el estudio a sus hijos y seguir manteniendo la producción de calidad.
El grupo se llama Luchando Por el Futuro, integrado por tres miembros que se dedican también a la agricultura y residen en la misma localidad. El préstamo que solicitan es por 18,000 Lempiras en total con el cual van a comprar insumos, abonos y pago de mano de obra para sus cultivos. En la foto esta doña Bernarda a la izquierda, Fani, e Irma a la derecha.
texts.en:
Irma is 42 years old, married, has 3 children, and lives with her family in a town in the municipality of Gracias Lempira. Irma works at her own source of income, which is growing corn, beans and coffee. She has done this work for 16 years, offering the produce in the markets in the zone. These crops she grows with the help of her husband as well. With the end of having a productive activity, she has decided to ask for a group loan to purchase manure, fungicides, and pay labor costs for the cultivation of corn and beans and to do maintenance on her coffee plot. She is thinking of continuing to work to provide her children with an education and continue maintaining the quality product.

The group is called Luchando Por el Futuro, made up of three members who also work in agriculture and live in the same place. The loan that they request is for 18,000 lempiras in total, with which they will purchase supplies, manure and pay labor costs for their crops. In the photo are Bernarda on the left, Fani, and Irma on the right.

loans.use: to purchase manure, fungicide and pay labor costs to cultivate corn, beans and maintain the coffee crop.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a maize farmer from Dan'asabe village. As a Babban Gona member, Ibrahim is excited to have access to a trained agronomist and superior inputs that will give him the chance to achieve high yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times higher than the average Nigerian farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Ibrahim would have had to sell his maize at harvest, when the price of maize is at its lowest, to meet his immediate cash needs for food and clothing. As a Babban Gona member, Ibrahim can store the maize he harvests and delay its sale until a period later on in the season, when he can obtain the best price for his maize at a premium of up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

Thanks to the support from Babban Gona’s marketing services, Ibrahim no longer feels the pressure to sell his maize at low harvest prices. With the opportunity to earn up to $2,000 per hectare of land, Ibrahim hopes to realize better yields, and plans on using his additional income to ensure that all his children get a post-secondary education.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating the pressure to sell his maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Karen Yanina

texts.es:
La señora Karen de 35  años de edad es casada, tiene 2 hijas  que dependen y vive junto a su familia en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 10 años a la venta de mercadería como ser ropa de todo tipo y gustos, calzado, cosméticos, toallas, sombrillas, etc. su negocio está ubicado en su casa y también vende de forma ambulante.
Doña Karen visita a sus clientes en sus casas y negocios sus clientes le prefieren por sus buenos productos y buenos precios, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo valle al sur de Honduras,  es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de superarse.
Doña Karen está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de más productos como zapatos, pantalones, blusas, faldas, toallas, sombras, polvos, etc. y así poder tener su negocio bien surtido para la temporada navideña que se acerca, con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
Su sueño es crecer con su negocio y aumentar su clientela para mejorar su calidad de vida.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Octubre del  2015.
texts.en:
Karen is 35 years old. She is married and has two children who depend on her. She lives with her family in her own home. For ten years she has earned a living selling merchandise such as all kinds and tastes of clothes, shoes, cosmetics, towels, parasols, etc. Her business is located in her home and she also goes out to sell.

Karen visits her customer in their homes and businesses. Her customers prefer her because of her good products and prices. She lives in a community in San Lorenzo, a valley in the south of Honduras. She is an entrepreneurial woman with the desire to better herself.

Karen is asking for a loan to buy more products such as shoes, trousers, blouses, skirts, towels, parasols, powders, etc. and thus be able to have a well stocked business for the Christmas period which is getting closer. With the support of this loan she hopes to improve her income and her quality of life.

Her dream is to grow with her business and increase her number of customers in order to improve her quality of life.


San Lorenzo, Honduras - October 2015.

loans.use: to buy shoes, trouser, blouses, skirts, towels, parasols and powders for her business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora María de 51  años de edad es soltera, tiene  02 hijos  que depende de ella,  vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 13 años  al negocio de venta de tajadas de plátano verde que distribuye en pulpería y mercaditos.
Doña María  adicionalmente vende tortillas, frescos y también cría de cerdos, sus clientes le prefieren por su puntualidad en la entrega de los pedidos, es una mujer sola que ha tenido que luchar junto con sus hijos para sacar adelante a la familia.
Esta solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de plátanos verdes, leña, aceite, bolsas, etc. que son la materia prima que necesita para seguir trabajando en su taller de tajadas de plátano, con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar las condiciones de su negocio y obtener mejores ganancias, su sueño es tener un buen negocio y mejorar su casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre del 2015.
texts.en:
María, 51 years old, is single, has 2 children who depend on her, and lives in a community in San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras. She has her own house and has worked for 13 years at her business selling fried green plantain slices which she sells in grocery stores and small markets.

In addition, María works selling tortillas, soft drinks and also raises pigs. Her customers prefer her for the punctuality with which she delivers the orders. She is a single woman who has had to struggle along with her children to get her family ahead.

She is asking for the loan to purchase green plantains, firewood, oil, bags, etc., that are the raw materials that she needs to continue working in her business of fried plantain slices. With the support of this loan, she plans to improve the condition of her business and get more earnings. Her dream is to have a good business and improve her house.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October 2015.

loans.use: to purchase green plantains, firewood, oil, bags, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Dorothée

texts.fr:
Dorothée est très contente du prêt précédent que vous lui avez accordé, de ce fait, elle vous remercie beaucoup de tout son cœur. Elle voudrait renouveler une autre demande de crédit pour pouvoir développer et améliorer l'activité. C'est une activité rarement pratiquée ici, il y a encore beaucoup de potentialité, le marché est sûr.
Dorothée est une femme travailleuse infatigable. Elle mérite d'être aidée. Elle souhaite construire une maison en dur un jour car celle actuelle est encore en bois. Elle s'efforce de faire des épargnes pour y parvenir.
texts.en:
Dorothée is very happy with her previous loan that you supported, and for that she is thankful from the bottom of her heart.

She is seeking a new loan to be able to develop and improve her business, which is quite rare in her area. There is a lot of potential, and the market is safe.

Dorothée is a hard-working woman, who never tires. She deserves your support.

She wishes to build a more permanent house one day, because hers now is only made of wood. She is working hard to save up for this.

loans.use: to buy yarn cones, sachets, and tubino sewing thread.

loans.name: Victor

texts.en:
Victor is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Victor is thankful that the days of poor yields are long gone. As a Babban Gona member, he has the opportunity to achieve yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times the yield of the average Nigerian farmer.

Traditionally, Victor would have had to sell his maize for low prices at harvest to meet his immediate cash needs for food and clothing. With Babban Gona’s support, Victor will store the maize he harvests and delay its sale until a date later in the season, when he can obtain a significantly higher price for his maize at a premium up to 37% more than the harvest price.

With the opportunity to earn up to $2,000 per hectare of land, Victor now has the opportunity to actualize his dream to grow his agriculture business for himself and family members, and would like to use this additional income to provide employment to members of his community through his farm.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating the pressure to sell his maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana, de 37 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, no pudo seguir por problemas económicos, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, juntos tienen tres hijos que están estudiando.

Ana, se dedica a la venta de tamales y pasteles, pero también cuida los hijos de una profesora tres días a la semana y los otros cuatro días hace tamales para vender; los tamales muchas veces los hace por encargo y los que más le solicitan son de gallina y pisques.

Ana, necesita el préstamo para comprar maíz y hojas de huerta para la elaboración de los tamales y para comprar una cocina para hacer los pasteles y enchiladas, esto le ayudara mucho porque sus ingresos aumentarán.

Los sueños de Ana, son poder trabajar para que sus hijos terminen estudios básicos y puedan estudiar en la universidad y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Ana, 37 years old, went to school up to the ninth grade, she couldn't continue due to economic problems. She is married and her husband works in agriculture. Together they have three children who are in school.

Ana works selling tamales and pastries but she also takes care of the children of a teacher three days a week and the other four days she makes tamales to sell. Many times she makes the tamales to order and those that are requested the most are chicken and pisques [made with masa processed with ashes].

Ana needs the loan to purchase corn and leaves to make tamales and to purchase an oven to make pastries and enchiladas, this will help her a lot because her income will increase.

Ana's dreams are to be able to work so that her children complete their basic education and can study at the university and be professionals.

loans.use: to purchase corn and leaves to make tamales and to purchase an oven to make pastries and enchiladas.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is a 39-year-old, hardworking, married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is charged with the responsibility of looking after his family and paying school fees for his children.

He owns a retail shop selling produce items like posho, millet flour and beans. He is facing a challenge of inadequate capital, which hinders him from expanding his business to new areas. Besides that, George is planning to construct a good residential house for his family.

George needs a loan to help him buy more stock of beans, posho and millet flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy more stock of beans, posho and millet flour to sell.

loans.name: Maminiaina

texts.fr:
Maminiaina est une jeune femme de 29 ans. Elle vit en concubinage avec 1 enfant à charge dans un village à la campagne. Elle cultive du riz, du mais, des haricots et de la pomme de terre. 
Elle est emprunteuse chez Vahatra depuis 2 ans ou elle a pu renforcer le capital de son élevage. Pour ce prêt, elle va acheter une vache laitière et de la provende. Elle compte assurer le bien être de sa famille avec les bénéfices.
Son rêve est d’avoir une grande ferme et pouvoir cultiver toutes les terres qu’elle possède.
texts.en:
Maminiaina is a young women of 29 years. She and her one child live in a rural village. She grows rice, maize, beans and potatoes. 

She has been borrowing with Vahatra for two years, which has allowed her to strengthen her business's capital. With this new loan, she plans on buying a dairy cow and animal feed. She will use her earnings to help provide for her family. 

Her dream is to own a large farm and cultivate of her land.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
Oscar, de 39 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, porque la situación económica de sus padres no era muy buena, actualmente está soltero y vive con su mamá y no tiene ningún hijo. 

Oscar, se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde hace 20 años, este trabajo se lo enseño un amigo y actualmente lo realiza con ayuda de su mamá, esta es una de las fuentes de ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de él y de su mamá, pero aparte de la agricultura también trabajan en una plantación de café.

Oscar, necesita el préstamo para comprar 100 pollos, para que su mamá se dedique a la crianza de estas aves y evitar que siga realizando trabajos pesados. 

Oscar, sueña con seguir trabajando y mejorando las condiciones de vida de su mamá.
texts.en:
Oscar, 39 years old, went to school up to the sixth grade because his parents' economic situation wasn't very good. Currently he is single and lives with his mother and doesn't have any children.

Oscar has worked in agriculture for 20 years. A friend taught him this work and currently he does it with his mother's help. This is one of the sources of income to cover the necessities for himself and his mother. But, apart from agriculture he also works on a coffee plantation.

Oscar needs the loan to purchase 100 chickens so that his mother can work raising these birds and avoid continuing to do heavy work.

Oscar dreams of continuing to work and improving his mother's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase 100 chickens.

loans.name: Martine

texts.fr:
Martine est une femme courageuse de 44 ans. Elle vit avec son mari et ses 6 enfants à la campagne. C’est une vraie paysanne qui pratique toutes les cultures et beaucoup d’élevage depuis plus de 20 ans.
Elle est emprunteuse chez Vahatra depuis 1 an ou elle a pu développer l’élevage porcin. Les bénéfices lui ont permis d’assurer la rentrée scolaire,  de constituer de l’épargne et de renforcer le capital des activités. Avec ce prêt, Martine va acheter une vache laitière et de la provende pour la nourriture de la vache. Le marché du lait est encore prometteur. 
Elle a comme objectif de développer sa ferme afin d’avoir beaucoup de bénéfice pour le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en: Martine is a brave woman of 44. She lives with her husband and her six children in the country. She is a true farmer and she has been working in all sorts of cultures and a lot of livestock farming for over 20 years. She has been borrowing from Vahatra for a year and this has enabled her to develop her pig farming. The profits have helped her provide for the new school term, to make some savings, and to increase the capital of her business. With this loan, Martine would like to buy a dairy cow, and cow feed to nourish the cow. The future of the milk market is looking good. Her objective is to develop her farm and make a lot of profit to guarantee her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow and cow feed.

loans.name: Jesenia

texts.es: Jesenia, es una mujer emprendedora, tiene 23 años de edad, es soltera, vive con sus papás actualmente. Ella con el crédito va comprar la mercadería necesaria para seguir con su pequeño negocio de tienda de ropa. Ella hace varios años se dedica al comercio y venta de todo tipo de ropa y también bisutería. Ella tiene como meta mejorar su diversidad de productos para ofrecerle a su clientela, ella espera aumentar sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos económicos para tener una mejor estabilidad y un mejor futuro.  Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jesenia is a busy woman. She is 23 years ols, single, and is living with her parents at the moment.
With the loan she is going to buy the necessary merchandise to continue with her small clothing store. For some years she is trading and selling clothing of all kinds and also fashion jewellery.
Her aim is to increase the diversity of her products that she offers her customers.
She hopes to increase her sales and increase her economic income to have a better security and a better future.
It´s the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She doesn´t record any other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered her the loan with greater facilities and a much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her shop

loans.name: Kanara Bakyaratwimukye Group

texts.en:
Jane is a hardworking, married woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She is a member of the Kanara Bakyara Twimukye Group who runs a retail shop to earn a living. Apart from that, she also grows crops to supplement her earnings and sells foodstuffs.

She started her business with an aim of educating her children and improving their standard of living in the near future. Jane would love to expand her business, which she believes is a backbone to achieving her dream, but bad weather and high inflation rates have hindered her targets.

She is requesting a loan to buy more sugar, crates of soda and rice to sell.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, crates of soda and rice to sell.

loans.name: Mariette

texts.fr:
Mariette est une femme de 48 ans, mariée avec 6 enfants à charge. Elle habite à la campagne et exerce des activités de culture et d’élevage. 
Cela fait 2 ans qu’elle est emprunteuse chez Vahatra. Les prêts précédents lui ont permis d’acheter les zébus et des vaches. Avec ce prêt, elle va acheter des semences de soja et des fumiers. En effet, elle va cultiver du soja, elle a déjà des clients prêts à en acheter.
Mariette espère que ces enfants réussissent dans la vie. Elle constitue beaucoup d’épargne pour assurer l’avenir de sa famille.
texts.en: Mariette 48, she is married with six dependent children. She lives in the country and works in agriculture and livestock farming. She has been borrowing from Vahatra for two years. The previous loans have enabled her to purchase zebus and cows. With this loan, she plans to buy soy seeds and manure. She will cultivate the soy, she already has customers who want to buy her produce. Mariette hopes that her children will succeed in life. She is saving up as much as possible to provide for her family's future.

loans.use: to buy soy seeds and manure.

loans.name: Rémi

texts.fr:
Rémi est un jeune paysan de 26 ans. Il est marié et élève 3 enfants. Pour nourrir sa famille, il pratique toute sorte de culture et d’élevage.
Il a été emprunteur chez Vahatra depuis 3 ans ou il a pu acheter des terrains productifs et quelques zébus. Avec ce prêt, il compte acheter 1 zébu à engraisser. Il va aussi acheter de la nourriture pour engraisser le zébu. Il a déjà un client qui pratique une activité de boucherie, prêt à acheter son zébu.
Rémi a comme objectif d’avoir plusieurs zébus afin de gagner plus d’argent pour améliorer la condition de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Rémi is a young farmer of 26 years. He is married with 3 children. To feed his family he raises livestock and cultivates a variety of crops. 

He has been borrowing with Vahatra for 3 years, which has allowed him to buy farmland and a few zebus. With this loan he plans to buy 1 zebu and the feed needed to fatten it. He already has a client who is a butcher, who is prepared to buy his zebu. 

Rémi's goal is to have several zebus and to increase his income in order to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a zebu and feed.

loans.name: Halliru

texts.en:
Halliru is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Halliru has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Halliru would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs for food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Halliru can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

As a Babban Gona member, Halliru will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2,000 per hectare of land. Halliru is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the lives of his children and family, and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating the pressure to sell his maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Liseth Magaly

texts.es:
La socia Liseth sigue dedicándose a su actividad de planes de seguridad, donde tiene que mantener las calles de su localidad , este trabajo necesita mucho tiempo es por ella que se dedica muchas horas día a  esta actividad.
Ella desea pasar una buenas fiestas de fin de año, por eso solicito el crédito  para comprar leche, chocolate y azúcar, estos víveres son indispensables en la mesa de la socia.
Liseth esta contenta con el crédito y desea seguir saliendo adelante con la ayuda que le brindan los inversionistas de KIVA.
texts.en:
The member Liseth continues to work in her security plan business, where she maintains the streets of her town. The work requires a lot of time, and she devotes many hours per day to this work. 

She would like to have a good year-end holiday party, and has therefore requested this loan to purchase milk, chocolate and sugar, as these foods are indispensable for the party. 

Liseth is happy with the loan, and would like to keep forging ahead with the help given by Kiva investors.
