Elido is the single father of a young son. A Kiva loan from you will allow Elido to improve his business and build his credit score in order to access financial institutions in the future.

loans.use: to pay for new equipment for his auto body and auto repair shop

loans.name: Nora Maribel

texts.es: Nora de 33 años de edad  vive con su esposo y su hermana, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pupusas, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y ya tiene mucha clientela establecida, con lo que ella gana de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunas necesidades que tiene su hogar, Nora solicita nuevamente un crédito para la compra de maíz, quesillo, chicharron, frijoles, tomates, etc. y asi poder tener una mejor estabilidad económica junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Nora, 33 years old, lives with her husband and her sister. She works making and selling pupusas. She has her business located in her place of residence and she already has a lot of established clientele. With what she earns form her sales and with the help of her husband, they achieve covering some necessities that her home has.

Nora newly applies for a loan for the purchase of corn, cheese, pork rinds, beans, tomatoes, etc and to therefore be able to have better economic stability along with her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese, pork rinds, beans, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Fortaleza Group

texts.es:
Virginia cumplió un año más de vida y ahora tiene 26 años (al centro, viste de celeste), continúa con su negocio de manicurista, el crédito que obtuvo lo utilizó para independizarse abriendo un salón de uñas, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque su negocio tuvo el éxito esperado. Actualmente la banca sigue unida y trabajando junta, sus negocios mejoraron y crecieron. Virginia atiende su negocio diariamente, y vio la necesidad de vender bisutería porque va de la mano con el servicio que brinda, “el complemento ideal después del arreglo de uñas puede ser una pulsera, anillo o tal vez un collar…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientela que exige bisutería, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para comprar bisutería. Su sueño es consolidar su negocio, ella desea comprar bisutería para vender en su negocio. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Virginia solicita un préstamo para comprar bisutería para vender en su salón de uñas.
texts.en:
Virginia is another year older and now 26 years old (she is in the middle, wearing sky-blue). She continues with her manicurist business. She used the loan she obtained to become independent, opening a nail salon. Her payments were on time because her business had the hoped for success.

The communal bank continues to be united and working together, and their business have improved and grown. Virginia looks after her business daily, and saw the need to sell costume jewelry because it goes hand in hand with the service she is offering. She comments: "The ideal complement after a manicure can be a bracelet, ring, or maybe a necklace...". The advantage of her business is that she has customers who are requesting costume jewelry, and the disadvantage is that she lacks the money to buy the jewelry.

Her dream is to strengthen her business. She would like to buy costume jewelry to sell in her business. This is the second loan cycle with the institution in the 10 years she has been performing this work. It is for these reasons that she is requesting a loan, in order to buy costume jewelry to sell in her nail salon.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry to sell in her nail salon.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like clothing retail and fattening pigs.

Leah dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Archie

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Archie works hard to support her family.

She has a mat making business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Archie is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy palm and other materials for her business.

Archie has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy palm and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es:
Rosa es dueña de un taller de reparaciones para motocicletas y bicicletas, su negocio es muy popular por el buen servicio que ofrece, con los ingresos que obtiene puede cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia, Rosa está acompañada y es madre de dos hijos menores de edad, hasta la fecha no representa dificultades en su negocio.
Con el financiamiento podrá comprar lubricantes y algunas herramientas necesarias para continuar atendiendo mejor a sus clientes, este aporte le será de beneficio para equipar su negocio, atraer más clientes y tener mayores ingresos.
Sus sueños son establecer mejor su negocio y abrir otro punto de servicio del mismo rubro en una zona más céntrica para que sus ingresos sean estables, pues de esa manera su familia tendrá mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa is the owner of a motorcycle and bicycle repair shop, and her business is very popular due to the good service she offers. With the income from the shop, she is able to meet the basic needs of her family. Rosa is married and the mother of two children, and so far that has not posed any difficulties for her business.

With the loan, she will be able to buy lubricants and some tools necessary to provide better service to her customers. This loan will be of use to equip her business, attract more customers, and increase her income. Her dreams are to improve her current business and to open another service point in a more central area so she can have steadier income, and in this way have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy lubricants and tools needed to continue serving customers better.

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is 39 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. Lina works very hard to provide for them.

Lina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like sugar, canned goods, junk food, home care products, and other groceries.

Lina has been in this business for 4 years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Lina would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like sugar, canned goods, junk food, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Vinh

texts.en:
Mrs. Vinh is a 47-year-old married woman. She has three children. Her husband is a carpenter. Out of his skill they have a business together, making furniture, which they started last year.

She is asking for a loan to buy more supplies like plywood, nails and hardwood. Her loan will ensure that they can always continue making furniture and accepting orders.

Her income will pay for electricity, food for the family, etc.

loans.use: to buy more supplies like plywood, nails and hardwood.

loans.name: Blanca Edith

texts.es:
Blanca es una señora  de 37 años, vive en la ciudad de Santo Domingo en casa de familiares con sus dos hijas, la mayor ya terminó la secundaria y actualmente se  encuentra trabajando como microempresaria y la menor que siempre la acompaña.
Blanca desde hace años atrás se ha dedicado a los negocios, aprendió desde joven ya que su madre siempre le inculcó salir adelante con su esfuerzo; Blanca vende ropa, cosméticos, calzado y productos naturales, ella siempre ve la manera de  no quedarse estancada en una sola cosa y emprende siempre en negocios nuevos y hasta ahora le ha ido muy bien.
Blanca es clienta fiel de la institución, este es ya su tercer crédito, siempre ha demostrado mucha puntualidad en sus pagos y comenta que gracias a los microcréditos ha podido ir fortaleciendo sus negocios. Ahora con este crédito nuevamente lo invertirá en mercadería ya que es una temporada buena para las ventas, desea comprar mercadería variada en ropa y también en perfumes, cremas, bisuterías y demás. Está muy agradecida con KIVA ya que con estas ganancias puede ir incrementando sus otros negocios y seguir adelante para mantener a su hogar ya que es padre y madre para sus hijas.
texts.en: Blanca is a 37 year old woman. She lives in the city of Santo Domingo in a house of family that are her two daughters. The eldest already finished high school and  currently is found working as a micro entrepreneur and the youngest always accompanies her. Blanca, since several years ago, has worked at business. She learned when she was young since her mother always ingrained in her to get ahead with her effort. Blanca sells clothing, cosmetics, shoes and natural products. She always sees the way of not getting herself stagnant in only one thing and she learns always

loans.use: to buy merchandise since a high season is coming. With this additional income she will be able to maintain her home.

loans.name: Mavis

texts.en:
Mavis is 35 years old and married with three children.

Mavis works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the localities of Osu and requested a 500 GHS loan from Kiva through ID-Ghana to purchase more pepper and spice products.

She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Mavis has borrowed and repaid three loans from ID-Ghana before this loan. She has been running the business for two years.

Mavis aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper and spice products.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 59 years old, married and has eight children, one of whom is in school.

Erlinda is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and repair her pig-pens.

Erlinda has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Erlinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and repair her pig-pens.

loans.name: Julie Ann

texts.en:
Julie Ann is a 27-year-old woman with two children, one of whom attends school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Julie Ann has a food vending business in the Philippines. Julie Ann requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business, such as vegetables, meats, spices, etc.

Julie Ann has been in this business for five years. In the future, Julie Ann would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business, such as vegetables, meats, spices, etc.

loans.name: Adelyn

texts.en:
Adelyn is 26 years old, single and has three children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur, and has been in this business for five years.

Adelyn has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 22,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José, solicita nuevamente ayuda con más capital, pues en éste momento no tiene los recursos necesarios, planea comprar suelas, cuero, pegamento e hilos, con estos materiales podrá seguir elaborando calzado y teniendo el sustento diario para todo su grupo familiar.
Para José el crédito anterior fue una herramienta que le ha facilitado tener un mejor negocio y ha además con los ingresos que le ha generado pudo reparar su vivienda, pagar su deuda y cubrir otros gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
Jose is asking for a new loan for more capital, at the moment he doesn't have the necessary materials. He plans to buy soles, leather, glue and sealant with which he will be able to carry on making footwear and provide support for his family. 

For Jose the previous loan was a tool which allowed him to have a better business, and also with the income which he generated he was able to repair his home, pay off his debt and cover other costs of his home.

loans.use: to buy soles, leather, glue and sealant with which he will be able to continue making footwear

loans.name: Hong

texts.en:
Mrs. Hong, a 51-year-old mother of two, lives in a rural area where she raises and sells small animals such as chickens, hens, ducks, etc. Her business is located at her house, and her years of experience have helped her to develop very good personal and work references in the area.

Mrs. Hong is requesting this loan to buy more animals such as hens, ducks and chickens. She will also buy balanced feed for them. By doing so she hopes to offer her customers a better product that will allow her to generate greater income to improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy more animals such as hens, ducks, chickens, etc.

loans.name: Sombang Lestari Group

texts.en:
Ni Kadek worked daily as a laborer but did not make enough income. Her husband, who is also a farm worker, felt the same. Then, Ni Kadek got together with other members of the Sombang Lestari group to borrow working capital to be used for raising pigs.

Ni Kadek feels very helped by the loan from MUK. Over the next six months, with a loan of 1,200,000 IDR, Ni Kadek will buy three fattening piglets at a price of 400,000 IDR per head. After six months' maintenance, Ni Kadek hopes to achieve a gain of 400,000 IDR per month.

She will use the profits from this business for her children's school fees and for the costs of daily necessities. With support from her husband, Ni Kadek is very grateful to get the business capital from MUK to develop her pig business.

loans.use: to buy three fattening piglets.

loans.name: Dina

texts.es:
Dina continúa con su negocio de venta de café medicinal. El crédito que obtuvo lo utilizó comprando café medicinal por mayor, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque sus ventas fueron continuas. Actualmente su negocio mejoró en número de clientes y cantidad de ventas, “pude comprar varios tipos de café, los cuales atrajeron a nuevos clientes…” comenta. Su negocio es exitoso porque el café que vende no se encuentra en tiendas de barrio. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con ventas constantes, la desventaja es la falta de capital para comprar un pack de café medicinal. Su sueño es contratar empleados, ella desea comprar un pack de café medicinal. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Dina solicita un préstamo para comprar un pack de café medicinal para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Dina continues selling medicinal coffee. She used the loan she received to buy medicinal coffee in bulk. She paid the loan according to plan because she could sell her products without interruption. Her business improved; she attracted more customers and her sales increased. "I could buy different types of coffee, which attracted new customers," she says.

Her business is successful because the coffee she sells cannot be bought in grocery stores. The advantage is that her sales are continuous, the disadvantage is the lack of funding to buy a bag of medicinal coffee. Her dream is to hire employees.

She wants to buy a bag of medicinal coffee. This is her second loan from the institution since she started her business a year ago. This is why Dina is requesting a loan to buy a bag of medicinal coffee to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy a bag of medicinal coffee to stock her business.

loans.name: Melone

texts.en:
Melone is 44 years old, married and has five children, two of whom are in school.

Melone is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Melone has been in this business for 2 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Melone would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Krystel Ann

texts.en:
Krystel Ann is 26 years old and married with two children. One child is still in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Krystel Ann runs a general store in the Philippines and has been in this business for 5 years. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, bread, eggs and other snack foods.

In the future, Krystel Ann would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, bread, eggs and other snack foods

loans.name: Nelissa

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Nelissa works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from dried fish making.

Nelissa is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy fish nets, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Nelissa has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish nets, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa, 49, is a married woman with five children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Jesusa has a buy and sell personal collection business in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional products like body lotion, beauty soap, perfume, underwear, bags and other personal care products.

Jesusa has been in this business for 4 years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional products like body lotion, beauty soap, perfume, underwear, bags and other personal care products.

loans.name: Angeli

texts.en:
Angeli is 47 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Angeli has a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as soft-drinks, canned goods and other groceries.

In the future, Angeli would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Zolangi Jazmin

texts.es:
Zolangi Jamin es estudiante de odontologia, ella solicita un prestamo para cubrir sus gastos educativos. Esta es su historia:Mi Nombre Zolangi  , resido en Las Palomas Licey al Medio, Santiago. Vivo con mis abuelos y mi padre.
Deseo estudiar odontología porque sé la gran importancia que tiene  la salud bucal para el bienestar de las personas en general. Si nuestra boca tiene alguna enfermedad, nuestra salud se verá afectada, nuestra digestión, e incluso nuestra autoestima. Es por ello que deseo inclinarme en esta área para con los conocimientos que adquiera a lo largo de mi preparación poder orientar y brindar mis servicios a aquellas personas que no pueden sonreír con libertad.
Universidad tecnológica de Santiago (UTESA) es donde pienso cursar mis estudios. Para qué esto sea posible necesito este préstamo, Ya que mi familia es de escasos recursos y los ingresos que genera no son suficientes para costear esta carrera. Mis metas son ser una gran odontóloga, tener mi clínica y aportar a la sociedad.
texts.en:
Zolangi Jamis is a dentistry student, she is asking for a loan to cover the costs of her studies. She lives in Las Palomas Licey al Medio, Santiago, along with her grandparents and her father.

She wants to study dentistry because she knows the importance of dental health for people's general health. If our mouth has an illness, our health will be affected, our digestive system and also our self-esteem.

This is why she wishes to educate herself in this area with the knowledge she will acquire in the long-term to be able to lend her services to those people who cannot smile with freedom.

She studies at the University of technology Santiago (UTESA).

So that will be possible, she needs this loan. Given that her family are short of funds and the money that they earn isn't enough to cover this career.

Her goal is to be a professional dentist, have her own clinic and help society.

loans.use: to cover the costs of higher education

loans.name: Babi Rahayu Group

texts.en:
Ni Ketut is the head of the Babi Rahayu group, making her daily living as a pig farmer. She lives with her husband and one child. Ni Ketut is trying to develop a pig business by borrowing from MUK.

From the sale of two pigs, Ni Ketut managed to make a profit of 750,000 IDR. The gain is very helpful for the family's finances as they are currently experiencing difficult times due to the increasingly expensive necessities of life.

Ni Ketut and the Babi Rahayu group decided to continue working with MUK because it is especially helpful in developing a pig business. Because the price of pigs and pig feed seedlings is growing, Ni Ketut expects an increase in borrowing in the next period.

Ni Ketut wants to increase her business by keeping local pigs for pig barbecue. She needs a new loan to purchase three local pigs and pig feed. The pigs for pig barbecue are usually only kept for two to three months before selling. Her husband supports her business by helping her feed and clean the barn. Ni Ketut saves her profit because she has a dream to renovate her kitchen.

*One member couldn't attend the meeting (for the photo) because she in hospital, accompanied by her husband who had healthy treatment there.

loans.use: to purchase three local pigs and pig feed.

loans.name: Guzman

texts.es:
Guzman con 43 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente,vive en casa propia de material rústico, vive junto a su cónyuge, ene l distrito de San Felipe,provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de maíz, ubicado en el Caserio Ñuruñupe, con una experiencia en el rubro de 5 años. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno contando con 2 cabezas de ganado, cultivos de maíz,yuca,piña.

Guzman es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa, a trabajado 1 crédito DE S/. 500 el cuál lo canceló con pagos puntuales. Firma solo.
texts.en:
Guzman is 43 years old, he lives together with his partner in their own house made of rustic materials in the San Felipe district, Jaen province, Cajamarca department in Peru.

He has very good personal and working references from the residents off the zone. The people of this zone mostly earn a living from agriculture, business and livestock.

He earns a living from agriculture, especially cultivating maize in Caserio Ñuruñupe, with 5 years of experience. The loan will be used in agricultural tasks, applying pesticides, fertilizes and paying for a work force. Through this it will help him with his physiology, morphology and his harvest production, and also give him a better quality of product and help him to sell. 

He also earns money raising livestock with 2 cows, maize, yucca and pineapple. 

Guzman is a repeating partner of Edpyme Alternativa, with 1 loan of DE S/. 500 which he paid off with punctual payments. He is signing on his own.

loans.use: with agricultural tasks, applications and incorporations of pesticides, fertilizers and a work force for his harvest

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Teresita works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell tobacco business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store business. Teresita is borrowing 15,500 PHP through NWTF to buy more tobacco to sell for her buy and sell tobacco business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now has requested another loan to further build her businesses. Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF.

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more tobacco to sell.

loans.name: Erminda

texts.es: Doña Erminda tiene 34 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de (18, 8, 5 y 3) años, todos estudiantes. Dentro de los sueños y esperanzas para el futuro de doña Erminda está la siembra de otros cultivos como quinua. El préstamo ayudara en la compra de abono orgánico para el manejo forestal de tara, con 16 años en este negocio le gusta porque la producción es más rentable que otros cultivos. El préstamo ayudará a tener una mayor producción y poder apoyar así en la educación de sus hijos
texts.en: Erminda is 34 years old, married with four children aged 18, 8, 5 and 3. They all go to school. Erminda hopes and dreams that in future she will be able to plant other crops such as Quinoa. This loan will help to buy organic fertilizer for her Tara trees. She has been in this business for 16 years and likes it because the output is easier to sell than other crops. The loan will help increase production and allow her to pay for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Yander

texts.es:
Yander con 21 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente,vive junto a su cónyuge y sus dos hijos, en el distrito de Colasay,provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura,especificamente al cultivo de café, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace 10 años. Solicita préstamo para invertir en labores de mantenimiento de su cultivo, para pago de peones y compra de abonos. De esta manera con el abonamiento de su cultivo obtendrá mayores rendimientos.

Yander es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa, no se encuentra bancarizado.
texts.en:
Yander is 21 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. He lives with his partner and two children in the Colasay district, Jaén province, Cajamarca department of Peru. Locals can give very good professional and personal references of him. Locals work mainly in agriculture, commerce, and animal husbandry.

He works in agriculture, growing coffee, to be more specific. He has a ten-year experience in this activity. He is requesting a loan to invest in maintenance activities for his plantation, pay for labor, and buy fertilizers. He will spread the fertilizers and make a better profit.

Yander is a new member of Edpyme Alternativa. He is not a user of any other financial service.

loans.use: to invest in maintenance activities for his plantation, pay for labor, and buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie, 31, is a married woman with five children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Annie has a buy and sell personal collection business in the Philippines. Annie requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional products like body lotion, perfume, bags, underwear, beauty soap and other personal care products.

Annie has been in this business for 6 years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional products like body lotion, perfume, bags, underwear, beauty soap and other personal care products.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa is 59 years old, married, and has five children (four of whom are currently in school).

Josefa is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Josefa requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Josefa has been in this business for ten years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Josefa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 47 years old, married and has four children. One of her children is still in school.

Elena is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Elena requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vaccines, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Elena has been in this business for ten years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Elena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vaccines, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 50 years old and married with two children. With one child in school, Evelyn works very hard to provide for them.

Evelyn runs a general store in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, junk foods, home care products, and other groceries.

Evelyn has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, junk foods, home care products, and other  groceries.

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es:
Oscar, de 48 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, creció con sus padres quienes le enseñaron estas actividades desde pequeño; ahora está acompañado y tiene 2 hijos con su pareja.

Oscar, se levanta temprano para ordeñar las vacas y después sale a trabajar en las parcelas que tiene durante la mañana junto a sus hijos, mientras su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar las vacas que poseen. 

Oscar, necesita el préstamo para comprar más vacas lecheras, para incrementar la producción de leche y empezar la producción de lácteos como queso, crema y cuajada.

Oscar, sueña con tener un terreno para pastar las vacas y comprar un vehículo para salir a vender los productos lácteos en los alrededores de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Oscar, 48, grows vegetables and raises animals. He grew up with his parents, who taught him these activities when he was a boy. He is now married and has two children with his partner.

Oscar wakes up early to milk the cows. He then works in the plots he owns, helped by his children, while his partner takes care of the household chores and the cows they own.

Oscar needs a loan to buy more dairy cows to improve his milk production and start producing dairy products, such as cheese, cream, and curd.

Oscar dreams of having a plot of land where his cows can graze, and buying a vehicle to sell his dairy products in his community.

loans.use: to buy more dairy cows.

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en:
Juliana is 61 years old and married with eight children. One of her children is in school. Juliana works very hard to provide for them.

Juliana runs a general store in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like bread, canned goods, junk foods, home care products, and other groceries.

Juliana has been in this business for one year and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Juliana would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like bread, canned goods, junk foods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Tres Marias Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “TRES MARIAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio Luis pertenece a este banco comunal, el es un joven estudiante que desea salir a delante por eso el solicito el préstamo para poder seguir sustentando sus gastos de estudio.
El socio necesita comprar cuadernos y  libros que le ayuden en su labor académica y así en un futuro ayudar económicamente en su hogar.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de librería, negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de restaurante y brindar servicio de taxi.
La fotografía que está pegada en la imagen grupal pertenece a una socia que pidió permiso por motivos de trabajo y llego tarde.

el socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y asegura pagar puntualmente sus cuotas.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank "TRES MARIAS", which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

Communal bank member Luis is a young student who hopes to forge ahead in life, so he is requesting a loan to be able to cover his educational expenses. Luis needs to purchase notepads and books to help him with his academic work, which in turn will help him economically in the future at home.

The other members work in the following fields: a bookstore, produce sales, clothing sales, a restaurant, and a taxi service. The photograph attached separately to the group picture belongs to a member who asked for permission to come late due to her work.

Luis appreciates those who are playing a part in his dream in this way, and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase notepads and books.

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en:
Mary Joy is 26 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Mary Joy runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, junk food, home care products, and other groceries.

Mary Joy has been in this business for 7 years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Mary Joy would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, junk food, home care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Bernie

texts.en:
Bernie is 43 years old and married with four children, three of whom are in school. Bernie works very hard to provide for them.

Bernie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like beverages, home care products, personal care products, and other groceries.

Bernie has been in this business for 4 years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Bernie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like beverages, home care products, personal care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Carlos Gilbel

texts.es:
Carlos está solicitando un nuevo crédito por los buenos resultados que tiene al invertirlos en su negocio, lo necesita para comprar únicamente abono, insecticidas, semilla y herbicidas, con estos materiales sembrara granos básicos y eliminara la maleza para que sus cosechas sean más productivas y pueda vender más.
Gracias al préstamo anterior Calos saco una buena cosecha de granos básicos, con la que alimenta a su familia y vendió a buen precio el resto, su familia se mantiene y las condiciones económicas son más favorables, hasta la fecha no ha tenido dificultades económicas ni de salud que le eviten seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Carlos is requesting a new loan for the good effects that he has had from investing in his business. He needs only to buy fertilizer, insecticides, seed, and herbicides. With these supplies he will plant basic grains and eliminate weeds so that his harvests will be more productive and he will be able to sell more.

Thanks to the previous loan Carlos had a good harvest of basic grains, with which he fed his family and sold the rest at a good price. His family is provided for and the financial conditions are more favorable. To date, he has not had financial or health difficulties, and in the absence of these, he continues working.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, seed, and herbicides.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Norma Yaneth

texts.es:
Norma está produciendo más hamacas y ha logrado mejorar un poco la porqueriza, comenta que estos cambios son el resultado de haber administrado muy bien el crédito anterior, asimismo menciona que la situación financiera es más estable.
Requiere de un nuevo crédito para conservar a sus clientes satisfechos y tener  a su disposición los ingresos que tanto necesita para salir adelante, ella comprara cerdos y concentrado para engordarlos y luego venderlos, el resto lo invertirá en hilos para  continuar fabricando hamacas, tiene la esperanza que los resultados seguirán siendo buenos.
texts.en:
Norma makes hammocks, and has managed to improve her pig pen. She says that these changes are the result of a good management of the previous loan she received. She also says that her financial situation is more stable now.

She needs a new loan to fulfill her customers' needs and guarantee the income she needs so much to get ahead. She will buy pigs and feed to fatten them and sell them. She will use the rest to buy threads to continue making hammocks. She hopes to continue having good results.

loans.use: to buy pigs and concentrated feed to fatten them and sell them. Also, to buy threads to continue making hammocks.

loans.name: Noong Luong 36 Group

texts.en:
Hoai is 26-year-old married woman and the mother of a 3-year-old boy. She lives with her in-laws, her husband, and her son in a Thai-ethnic traditional house in a small remote village.

Hoai and her husband work very hard at agricultural production to earn income for her family. These activities include cultivating rice, growing corn and cassava, and breeding pigs, chickens, ducks and fish.

When she was a child, Hoai did not get a full education, so she wants so badly for her son to receive the best education. For that reason, Hoai has continuously increased production by taking loans to invest in farming and animal husbandry. This is the fifth time that she has taken out a loan from the Anh Chi Em Program and she will use the loan to buy a sow and expand her pig raising business.

Hoai hopes that, with her experience in agriculture and with technical support from the program's staff, her investment will go well and reap good profits. Hoai dreams that her child will study well and have a brighter future, and that her family will have a more sufficient life. (In the picture, she stands first from the right.)

loans.use: to buy a sow and expand her pig raising business.

loans.name: Maria Carmelina

texts.es:
María, de 40 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado, está acompañada, su pajera se dedica a la elaboración de teja de barro y sus tres hijos dependen económicamente de ellos. 

María, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos desde hace más de 10 años, este oficio lo aprendió de su madre y le gusta mucho, aparte de eso es su principal fuente de ingresos.

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar más cerdos y engordarlos para luego venderlos a un mejor precio y esto le ayudara a obtener más ingresos.

María, sueña con que sus hijos se preparen academicamente.
texts.en:
María is 40 years old and studied until fourth grade. She lives with her partner who earns a living through making mud tiles, and their three children who are financially dependent on them.

Maria has earned a living through breeding pigs for more than 10 years. She learned this trade from her mother and she really likes it, additionally it is her main source of income.

Maria needs the loan to buy more pigs and fatten them up so she can then sell them at a better price which will help her to get more profit.

Maria dreams of her children being academically prepared.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and fatten them up to sell them at a better price.

loans.name: Maria Dinora

texts.es:
María, estudio hasta primer grado, pero aprendió a firmar porque sus hijos le enseñaron, está casada y se dedica a los trabajos agrícolas, tiene 3 hijos pero solo dos viven con ella.

María, se dedica a la crianza de gallinas indias desde hace más de diez años, este negocio le genera buenas ganancias y lo realiza desde su casa.	

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar concentrado para alimentar las gallinas, porque las quiere vender en diciembre, que es el mes en donde las vende más.

María, sueña con tener una mejor calidad de vida y apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios.
texts.en:
María studied up to the first grade, but he learned to sign because his children taught her. She is married and works in agriculture. She has three children, but only two of them live with her.

María has been raising Indian chickens for more than ten years. This business leaves good profits, and she works at home.

María needs this loan to buy concentrated feed for her chickens, because she wants to sell them in December, which is when she sells the most.

María dreams of living a better life, and being able to support her children with their studies.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed for her chickens.

loans.name: Concordia

texts.en:
Concordia is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 48 years old.

Concordia has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines and has been in this business for 4 years. She requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional gallons of coconut wine to sell.

In the future, Concordia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional gallons of coconut wine to sell.

loans.name: Jeancy

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Jeancy works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from food vending. Jeancy is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like liquor, home care products, and other groceries for her general store business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Jeancy has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like liquor, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 51 years old and married with five children.

Nancy works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like condiments, canned goods, personal care products, school supplies, and other groceries.

Nancy has borrowed and paid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from food vending.

Nancy aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like condiments, canned goods, personal care products, school supplies, and other groceries.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 61 years old and married with one child.

Teresita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like dried fish, eggs, biscuits, personal care products, and other groceries.

Teresita has borrowed and paid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Teresita aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like dried fish, eggs, biscuits, personal care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Ana Marleny

texts.es:
Ana, de 48 años de edad, es ama de casa, no estudio porque que no tenía los recursos económicos suficientes para poder ir a la escuela, su esposo falleció hace 5 años y desde entonces ella a tenido que trabajar para llevar alimento y vestuario para sus cinco hijos.

Ana, se dedica a la venta de tamales de toda variedad, uno de sus hijos le ayuda en los quehaceres del hogar, mientras ella hace los tamales y una de sus hijas le ayuda a ir a vender los tamales por toda la comunidad; a parte de eso ella también vende productos por catalogo en su casa y también a sus alrededores.

Ana, necesita el préstamo para comprar maíz, aceite, leña, frijoles y consome para elaborar los tamales, porque se acerca el tiempo de cortar caña y ella le vende los tamales a las personas que llegan a cortar caña de azúcar. 

Ana, sueña con ampliar su casa y tener más espacio para ella y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ana is 48 years old and works as a housewife. She did not study because she could afford to go to school. Her husband died five years ago. Since then, she has had to work to give food and clothes to her five children.

Ana works selling all kinds of tamales. A son helps her with the household chores, while she prepares tamales. A daughter sells them to the neighbors. She also sells products from a catalogue at home, and in the surroundings.

Ana needs a loan to buy corn, cooking oil, firewood, and broth to prepare tamales, now that the harvesting season for sugar cane is coming, and she sells them to the people who come to cut it.

Ana dreams of enlarging her house to have more space for her and her children.

loans.use: to buy corn, cooking oil, firewood, beans, and broth to prepare tamales.

loans.name: Sawe Mutiara Indah Group

texts.en:
Ayu Ketut feels very grateful. She and the Sawe Mutiara Indah group succeeded in making their payment. As they expected, all the pigs grew healthy, fat and were sold. They earned a satisfactory profit. The profits are used to fulfill their daily needs, school fees and saving for the future.

With this new loan, Ayu Ketut has been chosen as the group leader because she’s a responsible woman. The Sawe Mutiara Indah group is asking for a new loan and now they will use it for pigs and other businesses such as small kiosks and services.

Ayu Ketut will use her loan to purchase merchandise for her kiosk. She sells daily need and school products. She bought piglets using her own money taken from the profit of the last loan period.

Ayu Ketut hopes both of her businesses will run well so she can increase her saving, later using them as business capital.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Union Y Prosperidad Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “UNION Y PROSPERIDAD”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

Inkil es una joven socia ella se dedica a dar servicios turísticos en una agencia. La socia tiene 31 años y 3 hijos por quienes luchar día a día. Ella trabaja desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la Noche. Su sueño es tener un negocio propio en turismo.
La socia solicito el préstamo para comprar bienes de consumo para su hogar, es decir ella necesita comprar arroz, papa y lentejas.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de productos de belleza y negocio de fotocopiadora.

los socios están contentos por el credito otorgado y agrádese a los inversionista de KIVA.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "Union y Prosperidad". This bank is located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco. Inkil is a young member and works offering tourism services at an agency. She is 31 years old and has 3 children she fights for every day. She works from 8 in the morning until 6 at night. Her dream is to have her own tourism business.

She is requesting a loan to buy consumer goods for her home. She needs rice, potatoes, and lentils. The other members work in businesses such as craft sales, clothing sales, a grocery store, beauty product sales, and a photocopying business. The members are happy for the loan and are grateful to the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy rice, potatoes, and lentils.

loans.name: Agapito

texts.es:
Agapito con 45 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia,junto a su cónyuge y sus cuatro hijos, en el distrito de Pucará,provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú.El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Agapito se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio, cuenta con más de 15 años de experiencia en el negocio. El préstamo lo utilizará en el negocio capital de trabajo para la compra de frutas.

Agapito es socio reactivado para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Agapito, 45, is married. He owns the house where he lives with his partner and his four children, located in the Pucará district, Jaén province, Cajamarca department of Peru. Locals can give very good professional and personal references of him. Locals mainly work in agriculture, commerce, and animal husbandry.

Agapito buys and sells fruits at home. He has more than fifteen years of experience in this activity.

He will use the loan to buy fruits. He is a reactivated member of Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy fruits.

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia is 64 years old and married with eight children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Ofelia runs a general store in the Philippines and has been in this business for three years. She sells a variety of items. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like biscuits, canned goods, beverages, personal care products and other groceries.

In the future, Ofelia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like biscuits, canned goods, beverages, personal care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Lorena Ruth

texts.es:
Lorena, de 51 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, no pudo seguir estudiando por problemas económicas, actualmente está divorciada y con su antigua pareja tiene un hijo de 7 años de edad que está estudiando y solo su hijo vive con ella. 

Lorena, tiene 19 años de fabricar y vender artesanías y recuerdos de El Salvador, ella aprendió a elaborar este tipo de artesanías, en un taller que estaba cerca de su casa; hoy en día tiene su propio negocio y está muy contenta de tenerlo, este negocio lo tiene en la casa y allí llegan los compradores a buscar los más bellos recuerdos de un pueblo con gran historia. 

Lorena, necesita el préstamo para comprar material para elaborar su producto como: madera, pintura, adornos de plástico y para comprar artesanías elaboradas de piedra y jade; de esta manera podrá mejorar la variedad de mercadería y podrá cumplir con los gustos de los clientes.

Lorena, sueña con mejorar su negocio y tener otro local y quiere darle a su hijo la oportunidad de estudiar en la universidad.
texts.en:
Lorena, 51 years old, went to school until the eighth grade. She couldn't continue with her studies due to economic problems. She is currently divorced and has a 7-year-old child with her ex-husband. Her child attends school, and is the only person who lives with her.

Lorena has been making and selling Salvadorian crafts for 19 years. She learned to make the crafts in a workshop close to her home. Today, she has her own business and is very happy with it. She runs the business out of her home, which is where customers go to buy the most beautiful souvenirs from a town with a rich history.

Lorena needs this loan to purchase materials for making her product, such as wood, paint, and plastic accessories, as well as to purchase crafts made of stone and jade. In this way, she'll be able to improve the variety of her merchandise and better satisfy her customers.

Lorena dreams of improving her business and having another location. She also wants to give her son the opportunity to go to college.

loans.use: to purchase materials for the product she makes, such as wood, paint, and plastic accessories, as well as to purchase crafts made of stone and jade.

loans.name: Gulab Jan

texts.en:
Gulab jan, a responsible mother of 11, lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan where her husband has been providing transportation services by driving a taxi for 40 years. The sole income provider for the family, her husband needs to perform badly-needed maintenance on his taxi to continue to provide his service.

Due to financial constraints, Gulab jan has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan to perform this maintenance, which will enable her husband to provide better service. She also plans to save some of his profits to meet her family's future needs.

Gulab jan is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband make repairs to his taxi.

loans.name: Elmer Yovani

texts.es:
Elmer Yovani con 39 años de edad,de estado civil casado,vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus hijos, en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú.El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la actividad de venta de servicio de transporte urbano,mototaxi, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace más de 8 años. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mototaxi. De esta manera hacer crecer más su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

Ha tenido des préstamos con Edpyme Alternativa. El último fué de S/.1,000.00 el cuál lo canceló puntualmente.
texts.en:
Elmer Yovani, 39, is married and owns the house where he lives with his wife and children. It is located in the Cayaltí district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque department of Peru. Locals can give very good professional and personal references of him. Locals work mainly in agriculture, commerce, and animal husbandry.

He offers urban transport services in a mototaxi, and has more than eight years of experience in this activity.

He is requesting a loan to buy a mototaxi. In this way, he will expand his business, increase his income, and improve his living conditions.

He has received two loans from Edpyme Alternativa. He received 1,000 PEN the last time, and paid them back according to plan.

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi.

loans.name: Salomia

texts.en:
Salomia is 55 years old, married and has three children. One of her children is in school.

Salomia is in the agricultural business raising native chickens in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it

Salomia requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her native chickens. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her native chickens.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 51 years old and single. She works very hard to provide for her needs.

Teresita runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, home care products, and other groceries.

Teresita has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to resell at her general store.

loans.name: Rubenia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rubenia aprovecha el beneficio de trabar con créditos para sostener y diversificar  el negocio de venta de platillos típicos, pan y ropa, de esta manera tiene nuevos clientes y sus ingresos son estables, los cuales utiliza para disminuir las necesidades familiares, ella mantiene el mismo núcleo familiar y por el momento no ha tenido problemas para seguir realizando sus actividades.
Debido al tipo de negocio que ella tiene su inventario debe permanecer surtido, por lo que se decidió a solicitar un nuevo crédito para destinarlo a la compra de arroz, frijoles, queso, pan, aceite, verduras, entre otros materiales que se necesitan para preparar las meriendas y de esa manera seguir teniendo las entradas de dinero para cumplir con sus obligaciones.
texts.en:
Rubenia makes the most of using loans to sustain and diversify her business selling typical meals, bread and clothes. Due to this she alway has new customers and her income is stable, so she can use it to reduce her family's expenses. She supports her nuclear family and, for the moment, they have not had any problems in continuing with their usual activities.

Due to the type of business that she has, her inventory must aways be stocked which is why she decided to ask for a new loan to buy rice, beans, cheese, bread, oil, vegetables and other ingredients that she needs to prepare the snacks. In this way she can keep up her income so she can meet her obligations.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, cheese, bread, oil, vegetables and other ingredients that she needs to prepare snacks.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
Florencia is a married woman with eleven children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Florencia is 55 years old.

Florencia has an ice cream business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for eight years. Florencia requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients such as sugar and spices.

In the future, Florencia would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as sugar and spices.

loans.name: Emma Judith

texts.es:
Emma, de 30 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos y con ella también vive su padre quien trabaja la agricultura y su madre quien realiza labores domesticas.

Emma, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos, principalmente de maíz y frijol, esta actividad la aprendió de su padre el cual hasta la fecha continua ayudándole en estos cultivos; Emma, se encarga de preparar el terreno y de recoger la cosecha y para llegar hasta donde tienen sus cultivos, tiene que caminar una distancia corta desde su casa y trabaja de lunes a sábado durante la mañana principalmente.

Emma, necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abonos, pago de jornales para poder cultivar, con lo cual espera tener una buena cosecha al final del año.

Emma, sueña con tener una vivienda digna, cómoda y segura para su familia y brindarles todo lo necesario para su bienestar.
texts.en:
Emma, 30, studied up to the eighth grade. She is married. Her partner grows vegetables. Her father works in agriculture and her mother takes care of the household chores. They both live with her.

Emma grows vegetables, mainly corn and beans. She learned this activity from her father, who still helps her with her plantations. Emma's tasks are to prepare the land and collect the harvest. She has to walk a short distance to go to work, from Monday to Saturday, mainly in the morning.

Emma needs a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as organic and chemical fertilizers, and pay for the labor needed to cultivate the land. She hopes that this will result in a good harvest at the end of the year.

Emma dreams of having a dignified, comfortable, and safe home for her family, and of being able to give them everything they need to live a good life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as organic and chemical fertilizers, and pay for the labor needed to cultivate the land.

loans.name: Le

texts.en:
Le is 33 years old. She is married, has two children and lives in a small house. Her husband is a carpenter and she helps him. They make chairs, tables and all wood-related articles.

They work hard to save, so that in the future they will be able to have their own house and keep working to educate their children. Le is requesting this loan to buy raw materials for furniture production.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for furniture production.

loans.name: Agapito

texts.es:
Agapito con 39 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia de material rústico,junto a su cónyuge y sus hijos, en el distrito de Pomahuaca,provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café,con una experiencia en el rubro de 11 años. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno contando con 2 cabezas de ganado, cultivos de maíz,yuca,piña.

Agapito es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Ha manejado 4 créditos de S/.1000, 2000, 1500,1,500,3000 de los cuáles a pagado muy bien. Firma con aval.
texts.en:
Agapito, who is 39 years old and married under common law, lives in his own house made of rustic materials, together with his partner and their children, in the district of Pomahuaca, province of Jaén, department of Cajamarca, in the country of Peru. He has very good personal and labor references from the inhabitants of the area. Most of the people of this locality make a living in agriculture, through trade and farming.

He makes a living in agriculture, specifically coffee-growing, with about 11 years of experience. The loan that will be granted to him will be used for farming, application and incorporation of phytosanitary products, fertilizers, and manual labor for his harvest. In this way it will help him improve the physiology, morphology, and productivity of his cultivation, and have an adequate harvest, and through this have better production and a higher quality product, which he will have no problem selling. Additionally, he breeds cattle, having two cows, and cultivates corn, cassava, and pineapple.

Agapito is a returning member of Edpyme Alternativa. He has managed 4 loans of S./1000, 2000, 1500, and 3000, which he has paid off very well. Firm endorsement.

loans.use: to use in farming, application and incorporation of phytosanitary products, fertilizers, and manual labor for his harvest

loans.name: Tuliya Group

texts.fr: Zihalirwa est une femme d’affaires, présidente du groupe de crédits «Tuliya», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, âgée de 43 ans, marié, mère de 10 enfants dont 8 scolarisés et 2 sont gosses. Elle est vendeuse de friperies au marché de la ville depuis 10 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en 1/3 ballon de friperie. Elle commença son business avec le capital reçu de son mari qui est menuisier. Elle souhaite construire une maison, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Zihalirwa is a businesswoman and the president of the Tuliya Group, a client of IMF Hekima. She is a 46-year-old married mother to 10 children; eight of them are currently attending school while the remaining two are still infants.

She has been selling second-hand clothing at market for the past 10 years. She wants to purchase supplies of second-hand clothing. She started her business with capital provided by her husband, who works as a carpenter. She hopes to be able to build her own home, as well as provide her children with food and a good education. Finally, she would like to thank Hekima for the support they give to entrepreneurs excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to purchase supplies of second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Patty Joy

texts.en:
Patty Joy is a single woman with three children. She is 26 years old and all three of her children are currently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur

Patty Joy has a food vending business in the Philippines. Patty Joy requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, spices, fish, pork and other materials for her food production business.

Patty Joy has been in this business for 3 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, spices, fish, pork and other materials for her food production business

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es:
María, de 29 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, actualmente está casada, su pareja se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos, tienen dos hijos en común de 5 y 3 años de edad respectivamente.

María, tiene una tienda en su casa, en dicha tienda tiene a la venta todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad como bebidas, granos básicos, golosinas, etc la cual inicio por iniciativa propia; esto lo hizo porque en su cantón no existía ninguna tienda y las personas de dicha comunidad tenían que viajar mucho tiempo para ir a comprar los productos que necesitaban en su hogar.- Su esposo ayuda en la tienda cuando ella tiene que salir por algún razón y su horario de trabajo es de lunes a domingo de 08:00 a.m. hasta las 05:00 p.m.


María, necesita el préstamo para comprar más productos para su tienda como por ejemplo: bebidas, golosinas, granos básicos, entre otros; de esta manera espera tener otros productos disponibles para que sus ventas aumenten.

María, sueña con darle a su familia todo lo necesario para tener una vida digna, e incrementara el inventario de su tienda.
texts.en:
María, 29, studied up to the eighth grade. She is currently married. Her partner works growing vegetables. They have two children, aged five and three.

María has a store at home, where she sells all kinds of essential products, such as beverages, vegetables, and candies. She opened it on her own initiative, after realizing that the neighborhood did not have a store, and locals had to travel long distances to buy the products they needed at home.

Her husband helps her when she has to leave for some reason. She works from Monday to Sunday, from 8:00 am until 5:00 pm.

María needs the loan to buy more products for her store, such as beverages, candies, and vegetables. She hopes to have a wider variety of products so that her sales increase.

María dreams of being able to give her family everything they need to live a dignified life. She will increase her store's stock levels.

loans.use: to buy more products for her store, such as beverages, candies, and vegetables.

loans.name: Iliya

texts.en:
Iliya is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Iliya has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of maize per Hectare of Land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Iliya would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Iliya can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

As a Babban Gona member, Iliya will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. Iliya is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to ensure that all his children get a post secondary education.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes, de 73 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, actualmente está casado, vive solo con su esposa, porque sus hijos ya son personas mayores de edad y viven en casas diferentes; su esposa  se dedica a realizar oficios domésticos y a cuidar aves de corral y cerdos.

Mercedes, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como maíz y frijol, estas actividades las realiza desde hace muchos años, en su casa él es el único que se dedica a dichas labores agrícolas.

Mercedes, necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abonos, pago de jornales y preparación de terreno para cultivar, con lo cual espera tener una buena cosecha a finales de este año.

Mercedes, sueña con tener una vivienda digna, cómoda y segura para su esposa.
texts.en:
Mercedes, who is 73, went to school through the second grade; he is currently married and lives alone with his wife because his children are now adults and they live in their own homes. His wife is a homemaker and she keeps birds and pigs.

Mercedes grows staple grains, such as corn and beans. He has been in this business for many years. He is the only one in his home who does this agricultural work.

Mercedes needs this loan to buy farming supplies, such as fertilizers and manures, to pay for labor, and to prepare his land for planting. With this he hopes to have a good harvest at the end of the year.

Mercedes dreams of having a respectable, comfortable, and safe home for his wife.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, such as fertilizers and manures, to pay for labor, and to prepare his land for planting.

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.ru:
Нилуфар позитивная и трудолюбивая женщина.Ей 34 лет. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. С детства Нилуфар мечтала стать врачом, но так сложились обстоятельства, что она не смогла получить высшего образования из-за финансовой недостаточности в семье. Сразу после окончания средней школы Нилуфар выдали замуж. И так она стала домохозяйкой. Но, даже находясь постоянно  дома,  Нилуфар никогда не сидит без дела. Она вместе с мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым.
Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Нилуфар вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Нилуфар выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Нилуфар получает хороший доход. Муж Нилуфар также работает в местной мастерской и  его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Нилуфар с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Нилуфар заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи
texts.en:
Nilufar is a positive and hardworking woman. She is 34 years old. She is married and has three children. She lives in a small rural village. Since her childhood, Nilufar dreamed of becoming a doctor. However the circumstances were such that she was not able to get higher education, due to her family's lack of finances.

Soon after finishing high school, Nilufar got married. This way she became a housewife. However even if she stays at home, Nilufar never sits idle. Together with her husband, she strives to do everything possible to provide their children with everything necessary. In order to have a stable income for food, Nilufar and her husband started their own business. They work with livestock breeding.

Nilufar breeds livestock and then sells the meat and milk from it. She gets a good income from this business. Nilufar's husband also works as a local builder, and his work brings in an additional income. Their combined income is enough for middle class living. And still they don't have enough money to cover all their needs.

Currently Nilufar and her husband would like to purchase some additional livestock to breed. Therefore Nilufar turned to "Arvand" to take a loan to purchase livestock. Nilufar thanks "Arvand" in advance for the support, which will increase the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Urunisa

texts.ru: Уруниса, 52 года, замужем, с ней и ее супругом живет сын с семьей, внуку 1 год. У Урунисы - среднее образование, она знает, как правильно использовать и планировать денежные средства для достижения поставленных целей. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Уруниса занимается животноводством, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 3 коровы. Также на 0,80 Га земли выращивает кукурузу и помидоры. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Уруниса обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Уруниса планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Urunisa is 52 years old and married. Her son and his family live with Urunisa and her husband, including their 1 year old grandchild. Urunisa has secondary education. She knows how to plan and spend money in a good way in order to reach the goals she's set.

As a main source of income for her family, Urunisa works with livestock breeding. Currently her farm has three cows. She also grows corn and tomatoes on 0.80 hectares of land. The monthly income is around 20,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further develop her business, Urunisa turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) to purchase three cows to increase her herd. She plans to invest the income from the loan in further expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase three cows in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Mahinahon

texts.ru:
Эту девушку зовут Махинахон. Махинахон 20 летняя самостоятельная девушка в семье. Не смотря на ее молодой возраст уже можно назвать ее мастерицей. Махинахон вышивает национальное платье. Она признается, что вышивание ее любимое дело. У Махинахон имеется больше клиенты как другие  швеи, а также Махинахон вышивает на заказ. 
Махинахон не замужем, она живет вместе с родителем в городе Худжанд. Махинахон просит кредит для купли вышивальной машинки и желает улучшить свои навыки шитья и расширить деятельность. Махинахон надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
This girl is called Mahinahon. She is a 20 years old independent girl. Despite her young age, she already is able to call herself a master seamstress. Mahinahon sews traditional dresses. She confesses that her favorite activity is embroidery.

Mahinahon has more customers than other seamstresses, and she sews on order. She is not married and lives together with her parents in the city of Khujand. Mahinahon requests a loan to purhcase an embroidery machine and hopes to improve her sewing skills and expand her business.

Mahinahon hopes for your support.

loans.use: to purchase an embroidery machine

loans.name: Alfreda

texts.en:
Alfreda is 38 years old and single.

Alfreda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, candies, noodles, breads, milk, sugar, cigarettes and snack foods.

Alfreda has borrowed and repaid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for one year and also earns an income from manicure and pedicure services.

Alfreda aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, candies, noodles, breads, milk, sugar, cigarettes and snack foods.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
María, elabora tortillas, tamales y comida para vender y así obtener ingresos, tiene 15 años de haber fundado su negocio, el oficio lo heredo de su familia, actualmente vive con su esposo, una hija y sus nietos, María desempeña diferentes roles dentro de su familia, por lo que esta comprometida a seguir trabajando para que en su hogar sus parientes tengan el sustento diario.
Comprará maíz, leña, pollo, verduras, y condimentos para hacer los tamales que ofrece a sus clientes, para ella la inversión es una oportunidad para incrementar la producción y tener mayores ventas, espera que no se le dificulte la administración del crédito ni de sus ganancias para resarcir su deuda.
Las metas que tiene María son tener un negocio más grande y que su situación financiera sea más estable.
texts.en:
María makes tortillas, tamales, and prepared foods to sell, which is how she makes a living. She started her business 15 years ago; she inherited the profession from her family. She currently lives with her husband, one daughter, and her grandchildren. María plays different roles in her family, which is why she is dedicated to continuing to work so that the relatives in her home will have their daily needs.

She will buy corn, firewood, chicken, vegetables, and condiments to make the tamales she sells to her customers. For her, this loan is an opportunity to increase her output and have better sales. She hopes there will not be problems with dispersing her loan or with her profits to repay her debt.

María's goals are to have a bigger business and for her financial situation to be more stable.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, chicken, vegetables, and condiments to make the tamales she sells to her customers.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is a happily married senior citizen. She is 80 years old and her husband is 84 years. She lives together with only her husband.

Margarita is retired. She gets retirement payment and so does her husband too, but they have expenses. Margarita's husband has to pay for his medicines. She pays for rent. So they need help in the form of a loan to pay for a medical test. They hope you can help her.

Margarita is with her husband in the picture

loans.use: pay for a medical test.

loans.name: Asalbek

texts.ru: Житель района Яван, Асалбек. Ему 50 лет. Он женат и отец двоих детей. У него одна дочка и один сын. Асалбек родился и вырос в семье образованных людей. Он хорошо воспитанный человек. Асалбек работает электриком. Он хорошо разбирается с электричествами. Асалбек 24 года работает электриком. Его сын учится в средней школе.
